story:
It's out September 18th, 2019!  Three months ahead of schedule! Grab Morningdew Farms on Steam Now! (You must be logged into Steam for the link to work!)

Sweet southern boy Cody always dreamed of living off the land.  Now he's inherited his granddaddy's old farm and can begin a wonderful new life in the village of Morningdew--a notorious Gayborhood!

Cody will need to work hard to earn money.  Once he has enough cash he can upgrade his house and marry one of Morningdew's hot bachelors.  In the meantime he'll be getting to know his neighbors, REALLY WELL, and will find the man he wants to spend the rest of his life with.

Part farming game, part gay 'adults-only' visual novel, Morningdew Farms has everything for gay romance lovers and farm game enthusiasts!  

You'll plant, harvest, raise livestock, sell goods, and earn money so you can advance through the romantic goals of the game.  

Clear, Plant, Water, Harvest, Sell!

Let's face it, your run-down shack isn't a proper home to start a marriage in.  Furnish the place and renovate, then you'll be in the perfect position to land a husband.  

Charm the pants off that man!

With seven bachelors, including a possible threesome marriage option, you'll have dozens of scenes with potential husbands.  Eventually you'll pick the man you want to go exclusive with.  See if you can charm him so he wants to stay with you forever!

This hardcore adult game comes from the makers of To Trust an Incubus, so you know it will deliver the goods!  

Speaking of Delivering the Goods: 

Y Press Games always ships crowdfunding rewards in full and ON TIME! 

Our great reputation means you can trust us to always keep our promises.

Grab the Demo!

Pick Censored or Uncensored (final game will only be uncensored). Pick Windows or Mac. Download the zip. Extract or unzip the folder. Click the game folder. Double click the application to launch the game!


Voiced by John Masterson, who played Saji in To Trust an Incubus.

Cody is super excited to finally start farming.  The lustful gay hunk picked the perfect village to start his new life.  Morningdew is a total Gayborhood!

Sissy is voiced by Elsie Lovelock (Camp Buddy, Xoxo Droplets, Heroes of Newerth, Wargroove)

Cody is lucky to have his big sister living right next door to his farm. She'll give him tips and spot him some money for his first week.  Sis is steering Cody toward some of the local hunks so he can settle down and find a husband.

Butch is voiced by P.M. Seymour (Devil May Cry Mobile, Full Service, Dear Monster, and Gods' School).

Cody will need to buy supplies at the Country Store, owned and operated by Butch!  This hardcore prepper and male dom takes an immediate interest in Morningdew's spunky new farmer!

Introducing Jasper Harrow as the voice of Jace. 

When Cody is ready to add some animals to his farm, he can get them from his adorable neighbor Jace.  Sweetheart Jace loves animals and is a member of a cult!  Wait...what?

Rusty is voiced by Sean Chiplock (To Trust an Incubus, Full Service, Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Persona 5, Danganronpa 3, One Punch Man).

If Cody wants to land himself a husband he'll need to renovate his beat-up shack.  Luckily, the badass builder Rusty can do the work for him. Rusty hides a secret behind his manly exterior! Maybe Cody will find out what it is?

Sanjay is voiced by Bryce Chadwell (Warlord’s Enigma, Hostile Taking, and Sensitive by Yaoi Press).

Sanjay wants to grow grapes to start his own wine label, and Cody's farm has the perfect conditions!  Can this upscale man work with a down-to-earth country boy?  And will sexiness ensue if he does?

Jeb is voiced by DJ Horn (Full Service, Winds Of Change, My Time At Portia, and XOXO Droplets), and introducing Gregor Sullivan as the voice of Obie.

Cody was warned to stay out of the woods, but can he resist the sultry call of the hillbilly?  What will happen if he dares to trespass?  Did I just hear a banjo? 

Nuzzler is voiced by Steve Warky Nunez (To Trust an Incubus, Ant Man [Movie], Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn)

As Morningdew Village's only cryptid (cryptids are things like Bigfoot and the Loch Ness Monster) Nuzzler must be careful about who he trusts. He lives in isolation with only his love of cooking to pass the time.  Will he reveal himself to Cody?

Pledge $25 or More

Square Dance With the Boys! 

Get the game and get your name in the credits!  This is the same price the game will sell for on Steam!  Support us and you'll get your name in the credits and help us make the game richer for everyone!

Pledge $50 or More

Pickin' N Grinnin'!

Get your name in the credits, a Steam key for the digital game, our digital bluegrass game soundtrack, and the digital art book! The soundtrack is exclusive to this our crowdfunding! Y'all won't find it nowheres else!

Pledge $100 or More

Have a Hoe-Down!

Get your name in the credits, the Steam Key for the digital game, the exclusive Bluegrass soundtrack, the digital art book, pick one of our sexy voices actors to tell you a message in the voice of his character, plus you'll get a Beta Key for Steam! Y'all will get Early Access to the game as we build and test it and be able to tell us when we done goofed! 

Pledge $250 or more

It's a Hootenanny!

Get your name in the credits, the Steam Key for the digital game, the exclusive to Kickstarter Bluegrass soundtrack, the digital art book, a Beta Key for Early Access on Steam, and you'll get to sponsor a physical item on the game map! When someone clicks your tree they'll see: (Item) Sponsored by (Your Name). Pick any name you want so long as it ain't plum stupid! You might sponsor a tree, rock, shrub, mountain, or patch of grass.

Pledge $500 or more

The Whole Shindig!

The Whole Shindig gives you all the physical rewards and all the unlimited digital rewards!  You'll get EIGHT custom key chains!  These are adorable full-color die-cut 1.75" PCV key chains of Cody, Rusty, Butch, Jace, Jeb, Obie, Sanjay, and Nuzzler!   

You can get the key chains as an ADD-ON For $125 after getting the Square Dance With the Boys perk.

You'll also get a physical copy of the full-color adults-only art book!  If you've backed Y Press Games projects in the past, you know our art books are AMAZING!  It's not just tons of gorgeous art, but Steve will describe the journey we took to make this game.  

You can get the art book as an ADD-ON for $55 after getting the Square Dance With the Boys perk.

Of course we couldn't have a Kickstarter without offering one of our squishy mouse pads!  Will Cody have a squishy butt, man-tiddies, or crotch mouse pad?  Backers will vote! This is the mouse pad below is an example from our last game for an idea.  It's sexy AND practical!

You can get the mouse pad as an ADD-ON for $55 after getting the Square Dance With the Boys perk.

You can add ten sweet 1.5" buttons to your button collection too! (Designs not final--there won't be any duplicates.)  Buttons are not available as an add-on!

Don't forget the super-squishy 'Country Boys Make Do' corn stress reliever and the 'Suggestive Eggplant' eggplant stress reliever!  Fun to fling at people!

You can get the stress relievers as an ADD-ON for $15 after getting the Square Dance With the Boys perk.

And, finally, you'll get a LUSCIOUS 6"x9" glossy, full-color scratch-off card with your Steam Code!  We haven't designed it yet, but it will be sextacular yet tasteful!

You can get the scratch card as an Add-On for $8 after getting the Square Dance With the Boys perk..

All Shindig backers will also get Beta Access to the game!  That means you get a beta key on Steam that allows you to access to the game as it develops.  We want your feedback!  Help us to make this game as awesome as it can possibly be!

You'll sponsor a physical item on the map.  It could be a rock, tree, clump of grass, mountain top, or, if you're the first backer, the bridge!  When people click your physical item they'll see:  (Item) Sponsored by (Your Name).  It's possible you'll be on a second map screen player's can click an arrow to get to if we can't fit everyone on the first map screen.

Of course, you'll also get your name in the credits, the Steam Key for the final digital game, the exclusive to Kickstarter Bluegrass soundtrack, and the digital art book!

Most important, you get our extreme gratitude.  This perk isn't cheap, and really helps us!  Thank you!!!

Writers

This game is written by gay convention celebrity Steve Nunez and prolific author Yamila Abraham!

Steve Nunez - The voice of Arata in To Trust an Incubus and co-owner of Y Press Games, Steve has worked on gay manga, games, and audio books since 2008.  Steve is a prominent voice actor with numerous impressive credits and also excels in voice acting production.  In addition to co-writing Morningdew Farms, Steve will also provide the voice of Nuzzler and do the voice acting production work for the game.  He's also an actor! Check out his IMDB!

Yamila Abraham - Founder of the graphic novel publishing house Yaoi Press as well as Y Press Games, Yamila Abraham is a prolific writer of gay manga, novels, and games, including the games To Trust an Incubus and My Magical Demon Lover; the graphic novels Winter Demon, Dark Prince, Bastard King, Pinned, and Yaoi Hentai; and over 100 novels, many of which have been translated in French, Spanish, German, Italian, and Polish.  In addition to co-writing Morningdew Farms, Yamila is also the art director and project lead.  She's the one who always makes sure our Kickstarters are delivered on time!

Lead Artist

MJ Barros - An incredibly talented artist from Chile, MJ has made producing art for Morningdew Farms their full-time job.  We're thrilled by their dedication and talent. 

Background Artist

Arina Samson - Ukrainian artist Arina Samson is the partner of MJ Barros and our incredibly talented background artist.  They live together in Canada.

Asset Designer

Lefthandman - We were lucky to find this awesome asset designer from Malaysia!

Programmer

ViviChibi - ViviChibi is the third co-owner of Y Press Games and does the programming for all games we produce.  ViviChibi has created the mechanisms for a visual novel farming game completely from scratch.  

Editor

Fairfaxleasee - Fairfaxleasee was drafted onto the Y Press Games team after backing the To Trust an Incubus Kickstarter.  Fairfaxleasee is now  indispensable as a line editor, game tester, and a designer of Steam Achievements.  If you see a clever joke pop up when you get an Achievement on Steam that's all the doing of Fairfaxleasee. 

This Indiegogo is a follow up to our Kickstarter where we made over $30,000!  We have the money to make this game, and are running the Indiegogo to allow more backers to contribute.  The more money we have the more art and features we can add to the final game!
story_txt:
It's out September 18th, 2019!  Three months ahead of schedule! Grab Morningdew Farms on Steam Now! (You must be logged into Steam for the link to work!)Sweet southern boy Cody always dreamed of living off the land.  Now he's inherited his granddaddy's old farm and can begin a wonderful new life in the village of Morningdew--a notorious Gayborhood!Cody will need to work hard to earn money.  Once he has enough cash he can upgrade his house and marry one of Morningdew's hot bachelors.  In the meantime he'll be getting to know his neighbors, REALLY WELL, and will find the man he wants to spend the rest of his life with.Part farming game, part gay 'adults-only' visual novel, Morningdew Farms has everything for gay romance lovers and farm game enthusiasts!  You'll plant, harvest, raise livestock, sell goods, and earn money so you can advance through the romantic goals of the game.  Clear, Plant, Water, Harvest, Sell!Let's face it, your run-down shack isn't a proper home to start a marriage in.  Furnish the place and renovate, then you'll be in the perfect position to land a husband.  Charm the pants off that man!With seven bachelors, including a possible threesome marriage option, you'll have dozens of scenes with potential husbands.  Eventually you'll pick the man you want to go exclusive with.  See if you can charm him so he wants to stay with you forever!This hardcore adult game comes from the makers of To Trust an Incubus, so you know it will deliver the goods!  Speaking of Delivering the Goods: Y Press Games always ships crowdfunding rewards in full and ON TIME! Our great reputation means you can trust us to always keep our promises.
Grab the Demo!
Pick Censored or Uncensored (final game will only be uncensored). Pick Windows or Mac. Download the zip. Extract or unzip the folder. Click the game folder. Double click the application to launch the game!Voiced by John Masterson, who played Saji in To Trust an Incubus.Cody is super excited to finally start farming.  The lustful gay hunk picked the perfect village to start his new life.  Morningdew is a total Gayborhood!Sissy is voiced by Elsie Lovelock (Camp Buddy, Xoxo Droplets, Heroes of Newerth, Wargroove)Cody is lucky to have his big sister living right next door to his farm. She'll give him tips and spot him some money for his first week.  Sis is steering Cody toward some of the local hunks so he can settle down and find a husband.Butch is voiced by P.M. Seymour (Devil May Cry Mobile, Full Service, Dear Monster, and Gods' School).Cody will need to buy supplies at the Country Store, owned and operated by Butch!  This hardcore prepper and male dom takes an immediate interest in Morningdew's spunky new farmer!Introducing Jasper Harrow as the voice of Jace. When Cody is ready to add some animals to his farm, he can get them from his adorable neighbor Jace.  Sweetheart Jace loves animals and is a member of a cult!  Wait...what?Rusty is voiced by Sean Chiplock (To Trust an Incubus, Full Service, Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Persona 5, Danganronpa 3, One Punch Man).If Cody wants to land himself a husband he'll need to renovate his beat-up shack.  Luckily, the badass builder Rusty can do the work for him. Rusty hides a secret behind his manly exterior! Maybe Cody will find out what it is?Sanjay is voiced by Bryce Chadwell (Warlord’s Enigma, Hostile Taking, and Sensitive by Yaoi Press).Sanjay wants to grow grapes to start his own wine label, and Cody's farm has the perfect conditions!  Can this upscale man work with a down-to-earth country boy?  And will sexiness ensue if he does?Jeb is voiced by DJ Horn (Full Service, Winds Of Change, My Time At Portia, and XOXO Droplets), and introducing Gregor Sullivan as the voice of Obie.Cody was warned to stay out of the woods, but can he resist the sultry call of the hillbilly?  What will happen if he dares to trespass?  Did I just hear a banjo? Nuzzler is voiced by Steve Warky Nunez (To Trust an Incubus, Ant Man [Movie], Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn)As Morningdew Village's only cryptid (cryptids are things like Bigfoot and the Loch Ness Monster) Nuzzler must be careful about who he trusts. He lives in isolation with only his love of cooking to pass the time.  Will he reveal himself to Cody?Pledge $25 or MoreSquare Dance With the Boys! Get the game and get your name in the credits!  This is the same price the game will sell for on Steam!  Support us and you'll get your name in the credits and help us make the game richer for everyone!Pledge $50 or MorePickin' N Grinnin'!Get your name in the credits, a Steam key for the digital game, our digital bluegrass game soundtrack, and the digital art book! The soundtrack is exclusive to this our crowdfunding! Y'all won't find it nowheres else!Pledge $100 or MoreHave a Hoe-Down!Get your name in the credits, the Steam Key for the digital game, the exclusive Bluegrass soundtrack, the digital art book, pick one of our sexy voices actors to tell you a message in the voice of his character, plus you'll get a Beta Key for Steam! Y'all will get Early Access to the game as we build and test it and be able to tell us when we done goofed! Pledge $250 or moreIt's a Hootenanny!Get your name in the credits, the Steam Key for the digital game, the exclusive to Kickstarter Bluegrass soundtrack, the digital art book, a Beta Key for Early Access on Steam, and you'll get to sponsor a physical item on the game map! When someone clicks your tree they'll see: (Item) Sponsored by (Your Name). Pick any name you want so long as it ain't plum stupid! You might sponsor a tree, rock, shrub, mountain, or patch of grass.Pledge $500 or moreThe Whole Shindig!The Whole Shindig gives you all the physical rewards and all the unlimited digital rewards!  You'll get EIGHT custom key chains!  These are adorable full-color die-cut 1.75" PCV key chains of Cody, Rusty, Butch, Jace, Jeb, Obie, Sanjay, and Nuzzler!   You can get the key chains as an ADD-ON For $125 after getting the Square Dance With the Boys perk.You'll also get a physical copy of the full-color adults-only art book!  If you've backed Y Press Games projects in the past, you know our art books are AMAZING!  It's not just tons of gorgeous art, but Steve will describe the journey we took to make this game.  You can get the art book as an ADD-ON for $55 after getting the Square Dance With the Boys perk.Of course we couldn't have a Kickstarter without offering one of our squishy mouse pads!  Will Cody have a squishy butt, man-tiddies, or crotch mouse pad?  Backers will vote! This is the mouse pad below is an example from our last game for an idea.  It's sexy AND practical!You can get the mouse pad as an ADD-ON for $55 after getting the Square Dance With the Boys perk.You can add ten sweet 1.5" buttons to your button collection too! (Designs not final--there won't be any duplicates.)  Buttons are not available as an add-on!Don't forget the super-squishy 'Country Boys Make Do' corn stress reliever and the 'Suggestive Eggplant' eggplant stress reliever!  Fun to fling at people!You can get the stress relievers as an ADD-ON for $15 after getting the Square Dance With the Boys perk.And, finally, you'll get a LUSCIOUS 6"x9" glossy, full-color scratch-off card with your Steam Code!  We haven't designed it yet, but it will be sextacular yet tasteful!You can get the scratch card as an Add-On for $8 after getting the Square Dance With the Boys perk..All Shindig backers will also get Beta Access to the game!  That means you get a beta key on Steam that allows you to access to the game as it develops.  We want your feedback!  Help us to make this game as awesome as it can possibly be!You'll sponsor a physical item on the map.  It could be a rock, tree, clump of grass, mountain top, or, if you're the first backer, the bridge!  When people click your physical item they'll see:  (Item) Sponsored by (Your Name).  It's possible you'll be on a second map screen player's can click an arrow to get to if we can't fit everyone on the first map screen.Of course, you'll also get your name in the credits, the Steam Key for the final digital game, the exclusive to Kickstarter Bluegrass soundtrack, and the
