story:
Farm Sims just got more magical!



Make yourself at home in Sun Haven, the monster city Withergate, and - now thanks to Kickstarter - the elven town Nel'Vari!






Magic is the best watering can!

There's something strange about those cows...

      The Wishing Well!--- Elios, The Sun Dragon!
 

Pet Baby Dragon Reward! --- Pet Baby Tiger Reward!
 

    Phoebe likes pie!  --- Catherine, too!
 

Sun Haven Town Center!  ---  Withergate City!
 

Multiplayer Farming (Elf, Dog Amari)!  ---  Elios Statue in Sun Haven!
 

      These dummies sure had it coming?! --- Naga Player going to buy some s-s-seeds.
              
                                
                     Iris and Vaan, 2 elven romance options

3 more of the 16 romanceable characters, as featured in the video!



Player customizations for days.
 







 

 Release Platforms: PC/Mac

 Intended Platforms: Switch/Mobile

 Number of Players: (1-8)

 Release Date: May 2021

 Primary Languages: English

Descriptors: Farming Sim, RPG, Life Sim, Dating Sim, Magic, Relaxing, Open World, Character Customization, Online Multiplayer





 

Welcome friends, old and new! 

Before biting into the meat of this page, we wanted to offer a little perspective and explain what’s new. Thank you for joining us, and please read on!

You may have seen this page and thought, “Wasn’t Sun Haven fully funded and THEN some?” Well, you’re correct! Our Kickstarter campaign was a resounding success thanks to the generosity of our amazing supporters. We reached almost 200% of our goal at an unbelievable $85,440!

Here’s a list of everything we have been able to do so far with our increased funding:

  • Bring FOUR new faces into the Pixel Sprout Studios family
  • Add the Elven world Nel’Vari into the game
  • Create space for TONS of additional quests and NPCs

 

And while we were ecstatic with reaching this level of support, tons of people in our discord community were still hoping we’d reach that one last stretch goal. Now that our community is calling for it, we can’t help but answer!

That’s right folks, we’re talking about MOUNTS!

So many people wanted mounts in the game that our Director Bruce changed his mind on not including them. We were originally just using magic for quick movement around the world. But, due to so many player requests, we’re now looking to use both magic and mounts. Funnily enough, Bruce actually keeps a counter to track how many times the word “mount” is brought up in our Discord! Just take a look at our Mount Count™ below.
 


 

This campaign is our response to the community. The fans wanted it, so we chose to go the route of Indiegogo InDemand. Consider it an extension of the Kickstarter campaign, or basically just “finishing up” our Kickstarter campaign here on Indiegogo. The sole goal here is to get mounts into the game. But while we’re here, we may as well use this platform to show you what we’ve been up to in the meantime! 

If you saw our Kickstarter campaign, much of what lies ahead will be familiar - but not everything! We’ve sprinkled our newest assets and concepts throughout the page, so get scrolling and take a gander at the goods!
 

 

Withergate Mounts Concept Art.

 



 









Withergate Mask Reward!

 Pet Baby Dragon Reward!   ---  Pet Baby Tiger Reward!


  Exclusive Sparkling Sun Dress!   ---   Exclusive Sparkling Sun Armor!


 


Greetings, Adventurer!
 

Welcome to Sun Haven, a trading town in the height of its prosperity! … Well, it used to be. Frankly, Sun Haven has seen better days. Traffic through town has been low lately due to rumors of monsters on the road. The citizens of Sun Haven have stayed afloat so far, but nobody has been able to return the city to its former glory – and this is where you come in.

While working to revive the town, you can be whoever you want to be. Try your hand at farming, mining, fishing, fighting as a warrior, or honing your magic power as a mage. The decision is entirely yours. Your skills will grow with whatever you choose, whether you’re raising crops and animals, engaging in RPG-style questlines, or even pursuing romantic relationships. And your skills only get stronger as you level up!

In your exploration, you may find yourself in the forests outside of Sun Haven. As you delve deeper into these woods, there's a change to the energy in the air. You swear you heard the trees whispering around you, but that can't be, unless...  you've found the entrance to the enchanted city of Nel'Vari! Take time to convene with the forest, learn about the Elves, and you might be deemed worthy of entry.

It seems like no matter where you go, though, one thing remains the same – dark rumors of monsters. You know that somewhere nearby Sun Haven is the monster city of Withergate. Rumors are that strange creatures have been flocking to this city. Could this be why people are staying off the roads lately? An urgent request befalls you, and now you must decide if you will heed the rumors or seek the truth yourself…

But in all your adventuring, don't forget to take a break and gather your strength! There is always time between quests to relax and nurture your farm. Take some time to engage with your new community. Maybe you can even get a meal with the dashing doctor on the other side of town!




Sun Haven’s level progression system has taken shape in the form of an RPG-style skill/talent tree. As your skills grow on your adventures, you will receive points to invest in yourself however you see fit. You choose where to focus your growth, what your specialty will be, and what kind of adventurer you will become.

That’s enough just talking about skills, go ahead and take a look at some of the skills you can invest in below!
 

 

Farming

Farming in Sun Haven is unlike farming in any other game. As lovers of farming sim games, we're committed to delivering a charming and refreshing new take on the genre. 

On release, we expect to ship with around 50 kinds of crops including the classics like corn, potatoes, and the like. But Sun Haven is a fantasy game as much as a farming game after all, so we’re going beyond the classics with some added specialties that will bring the spice back to an age-old gameplay staple like farming. Here are some of our current design concepts we think you'll enjoy (or remember from the video!): 
 

    A Few Crop Designs:

    • Gem Seed Crop: Plant a gem seed that produces gems later (so you don't have to accidentally fall in cave lava for the second time this week!)
    • Snappy Crop: Plant seeds that jump up and down when planted and watered (they're alive!). When they fully grow, they occasionally snap at players passing by
    • Forest Nut Crop: Passively attracts more forest wildlife like deer to your farm! Deer would drop antlers for you to use in crafting! 
    • Magic Acorn Crop: Passively attracts more squirrels to hang out on your farm. Squirrels would drop nuts or other collectibles for you!



    Watch out for the Jumping Seeds... you never know what might sprout!


    If you prefer ranching to farming, don’t worry! Animal lovers will have lots of options for their fantasy ranch, too. There are plenty of animals to raise in your barn - including some unconventional choices such as monster animals from Withergate and magical, exotic creatures from Nel’Vari!
     

    Potential Withergate Farm Animals:

    • Silk Moth: Drops silk, which is used to make cloth
    • Gem Frog: Grows and drops gems
    • Mimic Treasure Chest: Drops one random item from the game everyday
    • Baby Griffon: Produces griffon eggs and feathers
    • Loyal Werewolf: Fetches a random crafting item every once in a while


    Farming Summary:

    • A multitude of crops including monster crops from Withergate
    • Fertilizers to boost your farm’s output
    • Farming spells to speed things up even more
    • Upgradable farm
    • Barn for your farm animal family

     


    Some crops taste good and some crops taste YOU!​


    All that hard work paid off!


    Can you find all four animals in this pen?
     

     

    Mining

    Mining in Sun Haven has a sense of adventure, progress, and accomplishment. We want mining to be a relaxing way to discover hidden treasures and unique items to bring back to your farm.

    In open-world games, it’s important to add more than just space to explore, but also a variety of environments to keep you interested. We’re investing in this idea, even when it comes to our mines.

    Mines and underground caverns are a great place to improve art and aesthetic (not to mention lore!). So, we’re treating it the same way we would treat any other environment. To hit that adventuresome vibe, we’re making unique underground rivers, wild plant life, magma flows, and shiny gems all specially stylized to this aesthetic. The only thing you won’t find in the mines is a player bed!
     

    Mining Summary:

    • Multiple mines throughout the world to explore 
    • Gems and ores to use in smithing your next armor set (yes, the gems too!)
    • Mining spells to optimize your trips
    • Minecarts to help you get into the mines


     

          Gems (so sparkly)!  --- Mining made easy with magic.

    Your "home office"!

     


    Fishing


    A Croc's got to eat!
     

    Fishing in Sun Haven feels like a relaxing and light challenge. The “hook” is that you never know what you're going to catch next! We currently have over 44 fish available in fishable oceans, rivers, and lakes. To give you a better idea, check out the highlight reel:

    • Pufferfish
    • Popeyed Goldfish
    • Hooked Bottle (contains letters, lore, or quests)
    • Sharks
    • Ribbon Eel
    • Golden Trash Boot!
       

    While we're still building it, we also plan on having a "museum" type system just for fishing. We call it the Fishing Sanctuary, an aquarium for you to keep your fishy friends safe. The sanctuary is curated by Pete, Sun Haven’s veteran fisherman and Lighthouse operator. You'll collect rare fish from Sun Haven, Withergate, and Nel’Vari to help Pete with his goal of completing the sanctuary. And don’t forget to lend Pete your ear as he recounts tales from the sea. With over 30 years of sailing and storytelling under his belt, they’re sure to be good!
     

    One fish down, DOZENS to go!





    The sea is full of surprises - like golden boots and bottled messages!


    Fishing Summary:

    • Rivers, ponds, lakes, oceans, even tropical islands to fish from
    • Use fish for cooking or to add to your personal collection
    • Catch each type of fish to earn special rewards

     


    Cooking

    Cooking in Sun Haven feels cozy, warm, novel, and selfless. We want players to relish in their cooking no matter what’s on the menu. 

    There is a community aspect to cooking in Sun Haven. This approach is managed through the “Leftovers” feature.

    When crafting certain meals, there will be a chance to get an EXTRA meal (non-consumable by the player who made them). This meal is gift-able to NPCs and other players in the game, which will either give your friend a nice boost for their adventure or help you make some fast (and full) friends in town!

     

    Cooking Summary:

    • 48 different recipes and counting
    • Save leftovers for neighbors and allies
    • Grow ingredients for use in cooking or buy them from the shop
    • Give meals as gifts to impress your neighbors and increase relationships
    • Bring meals on your adventures to give you a boost in times of need


     

    What's for lunch? Fish and rice!
     


    The Chef's Hat doesn't make you a better cook, but it sure feels like it does.


    Someone say.... Leftovers??
     

     
    Combat

    Combat in Sun Haven melds challenge, skill, and fluidity. Farming sim games in the past have generally come with the price tag of stiff movement. Sun Haven is bringing elements from platformer games to make character inputs smoother - especially during combat. 

    In our game, you'll be able to jump, dash midair, and attack all at the same time. This means that if you optimize correctly, you should be able to move while attacking almost constantly. Just watch out when using those heavy two handed swords!

    The depth of weapons, armor, and spells is sure to suit your playstyle no matter what it is. Ranged combat, melee combat, and magical combat are all very viable paths to keep the cutting edge over your foes.

     

    Level up!
     

    Sun Haven’s monster compendium will have you itching to reach those upper levels of combat. In terms of monster diversity, we're working through 30-50 enemy concepts that will be placed all throughout the world for you to face. Because of the flexibility Sun Haven’s setting provides, we’re able to really go outside the box here. Between the monster town, Elven town, and medieval Human town, there’s plenty of room for enemies of all kinds.

    The main storyline includes 3 planned story bosses to defeat. Outside of those bosses, there are roaming bosses throughout the world that might be encountered at any time! So make sure to pick up every item you can get along your journey - you never know when you might need it…
     

    Combat Summary:

    • Melee combat (swords, two-handed swords, flails, axes)
    • Ranged combat (with crossbows!)
    • Magic combat (spells including fireballs and chain lightning!)
    • An array of armor to buy or smith yourself
    • A range of monsters depending on your terrain
    • Legendary boss monsters



    Zap 'em with the Chain Lighting Spell!
     

    Watch out for the leaves, they're.... dangerously cute?


    Legendary heroes need legendary armor!



    Romance

    Romance in Sun Haven feels dynamic and interactive. As you grow deeper roots into your community, your relationships will develop naturally as with anyone in life – we're talking about real friendship here!

    Dynamic dialogue options will affect how your neighbors get along with you. Be an attentive conversationalist to make fast friends!

    With 16 romance-able NPCs including 10 Humans, 4 Demons, and 2 Elves, you’re bound to find your match somewhere. Seek your partner out by talking to people in town and getting to know them all individually, then take them on dates to see if you really click. And when the time comes, you can take your partnership to the next level. Get married and live with your perfect match – regardless of gender!

    Our romance system is something we’re giving a lot of attention to. By the time we release Sun Haven in May, we expect to have over 1000 pages of character dialogue. This content is how your connections will blossom just as they would in real life - by engaging with people on a personal level. 

     

    Bonus: if you’re both wearing your wedding rings then you will get this cute heart effect when you pass by each other!
     

    Phoebe likes pie!  ---  Catherine, too!

     

    Romance Summary:

    • 16 Romance-able NPCs - including Elven and Demon options!
    • Dialogue-based reward system - earn quests and gifts by interacting with your neighbors
    • Dynamic conversation - paying the right compliment will land you in someone's good graces, but saying the wrong thing could get you the cold shoulder
    • Build complex relationships - gifts and small talk will only get you so far here; genuinely engaging in conversation is the best way to fan the flames of romance
    • Date system - choose a date spot and play your cards right to make some major progress on your relationships
    • Marry your real life partner in game! 

    Oh and before we move along too quickly, we want to showcase a couple new characters we were unable to unveil in our previous Kickstarter campaign. Grab your inhalers and paper bags, people, it’s time to meet our Elven heartthrobs - Iris and Vaan!

     

       

    Iris

    Iris is an Elven enchanter in Nel’Vari. Nature is central to her work, experimenting and discovering things about how nature and magic interact. Proudly independent, she values weighing options and making a choice of her own.

     

     

    Vaan

    Vaan is an Elven air mage living by his own moral code. He indulges his free-spirit by spending time in the wind above the trees, trusting emotion to guide him. Elusive and whimsical, he feels he doesn’t really belong to any society.

     

    Don't be late to meet your date!




    16 romanceable characters.
     


    Just three of the eligible heartthrobs in our game!



     


    The Center of Sun Haven Town!
     

    You’ve just arrived in Sun Haven, your new home. After your arrival, you receive a warm welcome in the tavern by the townsfolk. A lively evening ends with Sun Haven’s Archmage - a powerful fire mage named Lucia - lighting your way home before calling it a night. You retire for the night as well… until you’re awoken by a voice in the dark.

    Who could that be?

    A mysterious energy manifests in your home and leads you to a wishing well not far from town. The well pulses with a potent magic and you feel a vibrant energy building within yourself.

    What is this strange power?

    It isn’t until you make the journey to Dragon’s Meet that you get some clarity. There rests the Sun Dragon Elios, guardian and protector of Sun Haven. Elios senses an ancient power inside you, but it’s up to you to hone your abilities and unlock your magical potential - the fortune of Sun Haven may depend on it.

    Will you answer the Sun Dragon’s call?

    Your journey through Sun Haven’s story will put your abilities to the test. Use your wits to solve puzzles and unlock new worlds. When facing powerful story bosses, you may conquer them through combat or negotiate a peaceful solution. Secret treasures are just waiting to be discovered by anyone willing to dive deep into lore and myth. By scouring the vast world, you can find rare resources to be repurposed into powerful gear for your next quest. Most importantly, learn to harness the inherent power within yourself and battle the mysterious darkness spreading across the land.

    But every hero needs a home, after all. By immersing yourself in Sun Haven’s warm fellowship, you’ll see that strength can also be found in community. As a farmer, you have the chance to boost Sun Haven’s prosperity with your own sweat. The crops and animals you raise will benefit Sun Haven’s growth and your crafted goods may even bring new trade to town. All the while, your home becomes more your own with every hand-picked decoration you choose. Once your place is fully furnished, why not finally invite that shy baker over for a meal?

    Adventure belongs to the bold, and community to the noble. In Sun Haven, you will have both!

     

     

     

     

    All right adventurer, it's time you met Elios. But first, a little history…

    In the beginning, dragons dominated the land and people stayed hidden in the dark corners of the world. Because of their tiny presence - and because they hid themselves from the dangers of the world - people went unnoticed by the dragons for many years. However, there came a time when people and dragons were brought together by circumstance. 

    A Human village tucked inside a forest was discovered by a dragon during a raging firestorm - a storm that the dragon itself caused. Realizing that the little Humans would not survive the storm, this dragon shielded them under its wing out of mercy. 

    It wasn’t known by the Humans then, but most dragons are not naturally malicious. In actuality, they are considerate and intelligent beings. 

    Soon after that event, dragons realized that their immense power was endangering vulnerable civilizations of people and they took pity on them. At that, there was a turning point. Dragons decided to help people thrive and took on noble roles as guardians of cities and villages all over the world. In doing so, dragons established a peaceful era to the benefit of all living beings. The virtuous dragons have upheld this service for thousands of years, and continue it to this day.

    Elios is the guardian of Sun Haven. He claims the title of Sun Dragon and vigilantly protects the town from his vantage point on Dragon's Meet. The journey to Dragon's Meet is a dangerous ascent crawling with monsters, but if you can brave the trek to his mountainous refuge then you will have earned Elios's blessing. A blessing like that means different things for different people - what will it mean for you?

    By his presence alone, Elios brings goodwill to Sun Haven. The magical energy surrounding him is enough to bring growth to crops, health to animals, and clean flowing waters. However, it is when the Sun Dragon bestows his blessing to an individual person that we see the true effect of a dragon's magic. By imprinting his magical energy on someone, Elios unlocks the true abilities hidden in that person’s soul. In this same way, Elios gives you your first magical spell.

    Elios senses something ancient and mysterious in you, a power somehow familiar to him and yet unlike anything seen in a human before. Will you join Elios on Dragon's Meet to earn his blessing and unlock your fortune?

     

     Elios the Sun Dragon - Guardian of Sun Haven

     

     


     

    Let me tell you about the Elven city of Nel'Vari…

    Nel'Vari is an Elven town hidden in the deep forests west of Sun Haven. This enigmatic place is guarded by a secret puzzle that will test your knowledge of Elven culture. Only those familiar with Elven society can find entry, that way the Elves keep out anyone seeking to disrespect their way of life.

    The Elves have based their lifestyle heavily on the natural world. Eternally grateful and reverent to the power of nature, they build their structures among the plants and animals instead of clearing forests for their homes.


     

    The guardian dragon of the Elven town is Nivara. Her deep connection to the natural world makes her a wise and valuable resource for the Elves of Nel’Vari, who have based their entire existence around her teachings regarding the energy that connects all life.

    Nel'Vari is also home to unique forms of magic and crafting. Elven mages work with magic to discover the secrets of nature. Their research fuels Elven culture and society, keeping them in harmony with the ecosystem that gives them life. This balance sustains the forest from which they take their resources so the forest may thrive alongside Elven society. Elves are also master artisans and use nature’s resources to craft the finest woodworks. Elven woodworking is regarded as the highest quality craftsmanship in the world.

    What can you learn from the Elves? Will you humble yourself to Nivara’s teachings? Can you solve the puzzle and earn your entry into the enchanted city of Nel'Vari?
     

     


    Nel'Vari  Early Concept Art.

     

                      Vaan's House!  ---  Iris's House!

     


    Nel'Vari Grand Tree Concept Art.

     

     

     


     

    When the sky stays dark, you can be sure you've reached the rumored monster town of Withergate! Compared to many towns, Withergate is a more technologically advanced city. It is home to a diverse population of monsters and unique creatures who have pooled their knowledge and talents together to thrive. Here, you can discover more concentrated magic, purchase monster crop seeds, or even try your hand at romance with a Lycan or two.

    Withergate is a world where individuals of all shapes and sizes decided to work together. Here, bookkeepers at the library are tall Cyclops (who else can grab books from the top shelf for you?), the local tailor is a silk spinning spider, and the local haberdasher has three heads for modeling his wears!

     


    Withergate's seamstress and  haberdasher!

     

    The City of Darkness is ruled by the fierce Demon King, a figure known even to the fearful Humans in Sun Haven. The royal bloodline has been in power for generations - which is a very long time for Demons! Upon entry, you’re brought to face this powerful Demon in his throne room. Let’s hope you stay on his good side...

    Make no mistake, Withergate is our big bet in trying to revamp the farming sim genre. By leaving the lights off, we’re able to really show off some magic and glowing effects that wouldn’t look the same in the daylight. This also allows us to support some special members in our cast who prefer the night life (see our Spectral Knight and Ghost Girl characters in the video!). 

    Additionally, Withergate will be home to a monster carnival with games and attractions for all the creatures of the night!
     

    Your new buddy awaits you in the pet shop!
     


    Donovan, Spectral Knight, and the Ghost Girl livin' that night life!
     


    A lovely night for a stroll through the spooky forest.

     


     


     

    A fun game is a game with variety. Sun Haven’s customization offers a ton of variety with over 20 skin colors and dozens of eye combinations for your original character’s creation. There are plenty of other options for each of the 7 playable races with no restrictions based on gender!

    As an Angel, you'll mix and match your halos to your wings until you've found the perfect pair. Demons of course have plenty of tails and horns to choose from. Not to mention the in-depth customization offered by the Amari race – from birds, dogs, lizards, and aquatic animal parts at your disposal, you're certain to find a combination that suits you. By the time we're done, you'll have no problem creating your unique aesthetic. Just be yourself!

     

    Race options galore!
     

    Rest assured, we've got you covered with customization outside of character building as well. Your home can be upgraded up to 3 tiers to give you plenty of room to stretch out. By the time we're finished with development, there will be hundreds of decorative items to choose from. Furthermore, we aren't restricting furniture placement by snapping it to floor tiles. Instead, the decoration is done with free placement so you can really dial it in when setting up your home base.



    Free placement makes decorating a snap.

     

    Furthermore, if we hit our stretch goals then both Withergate and Nel’Vari will include space for a home and farm of your very own. That’s right, you can party it up every night in Withergate, the City of Darkness! Or if you’re really trying to cleanse yourself of negative energies these days, you might find balance between your life and all life around you by immersing yourself in the Elven culture of Nel’Vari.

    Still not convinced? Or, convinced but just craving more?

     

    Let us break it down for you:

    • 7 different playable races - Demon, Angel, Elf, Naga, Elemental, Human, and the animal race Amari
    • Highly customizable appearance - create an avatar that represents whoever you want to be
    • Customizable homes in all three worlds (if we hit those stretch goals!) - a well-decorated home can increase your social standing with your neighbors
    • Pets - choose a buddy to join you on your adventures
    • IF THIS CAMPAIGN IS A SUCCESS - Mounts to carry you along your journey


     


    Even your pet has their own aesthetic.


    Not just dogs and cats here - clouds make great pets, too!


    Pet Concept Arts.


    Who says it's weird to have three refrigerators?



    Player race variations...and counting!
     



     

    You’re certain to face many challenges on your journey in Sun Haven, but you don’t have to face them alone!

    Your friends and fellow adventurers can join your town to aid your quest. We’re designing the game for multiplayer from the get-go so you and your friends can jump into the adventure together right away. We expect to support up to 8 heroes together at once on one player-hosted server. Adventuring, treasure-seeking, farming, and making a life for yourself is always easier - and more fun - with back up!

    We’re accounting for the immensity of 8-player multiplayer wherever we can. To start, we’re developing a multiplayer game mode with a larger starting farm space for all of your friends to spread out comfortably. Furthermore, we’re toying with the concept of respawning treasure chests in the wild to encourage exploration for all involved players.

     

    Farming is better with friends... like 7 of them!



     

    A big part of Sun Haven is the unique and magical Wish-Granting mechanic. With this ability, you have the power to make real change by granting wishes. With a Wish, you can make impassable obstacles disappear or help a neighbor find a new home. This power belongs to you alone, so it’s your decision how you’ll use it to help the town. Harness your power to make Wishes come true!
     

    Wishes Summary:

    • Bring new shops to town
    • Increase the number of goods sold in shops
    • Help neighbors in need to maintain your community
    • And for goodness sake, wish the sick puppy back to health!

     

    Make a Wish!

     

    Pre-Wish Café vs Post-Wish Café!
     

     



     Take a peek at these various concepts and WIPs.


    Our art speaks for itself, but that doesn’t mean it can’t be explained a little bit.

    Like many other sim games, we started with 16x16 pixel per unit resolution. But then we decided that just wouldn’t cut it. We want this game to look amazing, so we stepped up the visual aesthetic. To make sure our magical effects would really shine, we bumped the resolution up to 24x24 - that’s 225% of the old pixel density and, well, the results speak for themselves:

     


    One of these things is not like the other...


    Withergate Pumpkin Monster, as featured in the video!

     


    Anne's House concept art - or more like concept cart!

     


    Watercolor concepts of the Wishing Well  and the Player Home starting area.



     

    We agreed that the best way to capture the whimsical and relaxing atmosphere of Sun Haven would be to create its music from scratch using the sounds of real instruments, so that’s how we’re doing it - with no old school pixel-y or arcade-y sounds. All of the music and sound effects in Sun Haven are being composed in-house from the ground up by our talented Sound Designer, Alex (see his handsome mug at the bottom of the page!). Below, you can listen to some of his work. 

    Here we have 2 versions of one of our themes - one concept and one (slightly) more polished iteration.

    Check them out here: 

    The beautiful track you're listening to is one of the concepts for the Winter Festival event, just one of the town events we're hoping to create in Sun Haven. When we were planning for the game originally, we wrote a story for what the first 20 minutes of gameplay would feel like (Day 1 of Spring), and what the last 20 minutes of the first gameplay year would feel like (ending with the town's Winter Festival). What you're listening to is one of the concepts for what we might want the conclusion of year 1 to feel like. 

    Can you feel it?



    This cow is in the moo-d for the season!
     


     

    Hey all! It's Bruce, the Director for Sun Haven writing this section!

    For the last year, I've paid for everything out of pocket by saving up where I could over the last few years. With a bit of hard work and some extra hours each week, I am neatly and indefinitely able to staff a core functioning team to complete this project. 

    So, to be clear: Sun Haven WILL release IN MAY. Period.

    In terms of funding support at this point, increased support means we will reliably be able to deliver on all these gems, sparkles, and scope of the game in time.

    Currently, we’ve already finished our last hiring spree (picking up FOUR new sprouts in the studio!) and I believe we’ve done this right on track for the development curve of completing Sun Haven on time. As both a director and a player dying to play a new farming sim with my friends, I would much rather a studio hire an extra person or two ahead of time to make sure the game comes out great, and on time-- so that’s exactly what we’ve done.


    While we CAN eventually ship a full scoped Sun Haven over time, I think what’s best for players is getting the chance to play the full scoped game right at release.
    (If you're gonna put magic, dragons, fantasy, quests, and two worlds into a farming sim... you can't just go halfway, right?)


    The dev side of things for us right now (outside of marketing) is pushing to flesh out our Alpha versions as fast as we can-- As such, I would say this game will be shippable by the end of this month, December. In terms of early access, we probably won't do early access because we really want the game to have its full vision when players first get their hands on it. I'd hate to come off as developers that aren't thoughtful in execution just because we didn’t allow ourselves enough time to polish a beta version of the game we’d later throw away.

    Our 14 person team needs community support to make Sun Haven the fantastic game at the scope that includes everything that we (and players) have been wanting. And to make this game at the scope that's going to fully satisfy the farming sim AND the RPG elements, we're going to need to make enough quests, items, and thoughtfully immersive settings for the combat and worldbuilding. Please help us make our dream game the absolute best it can be!

    In terms of actual financial breakdown, the allocation of funds received by our very attractive backers would look like this:



    Where Funds will be allocated!


     

     






     

    Thanks so much for your support!

    - The Pixel Sprout Studios Team

     

     

    SOCIALS

    Our Site: https://pixelsproutstudios.com/

    Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/SunHaven

    Discord: http://discord.gg/BqTCygE

    Twitter: https://twitter.com/SunHavenRPG

    Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sunhavenrpg/

    Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=1089564...

    Tumblr: https://sunhavenrpg.tumblr.com/

    Pinterest:https://www.pinterest.com/SunHavenRPG/

     

    Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ here, on the discord, or read more on the website!
story_txt:
Farm Sims just got more magical!Make yourself at home in Sun Haven, the monster city Withergate, and - now thanks to Kickstarter - the elven town Nel'Vari!Magic is the best watering can!There's something strange about those cows...      The Wishing Well!--- Elios, The Sun Dragon! Pet Baby Dragon Reward! --- Pet Baby Tiger Reward!     Phoebe likes pie!  --- Catherine, too! Sun Haven Town Center!  ---  Withergate City! Multiplayer Farming (Elf, Dog Amari)!  ---  Elios Statue in Sun Haven!       These dummies sure had it coming?! --- Naga Player going to buy some s-s-seeds.                                                                   Iris and Vaan, 2 elven romance options3 more of the 16 romanceable characters, as featured in the video!Player customizations for days.   Release Platforms: PC/Mac Intended Platforms: Switch/Mobile Number of Players: (1-8) Release Date: May 2021 Primary Languages: EnglishDescriptors: Farming Sim, RPG, Life Sim, Dating Sim, Magic, Relaxing, Open World, Character Customization, Online Multiplayer Welcome friends, old and new! Before biting into the meat of this page, we wanted to offer a little perspective and explain what’s new. Thank you for joining us, and please read on!You may have seen this page and thought, “Wasn’t Sun Haven fully funded and THEN some?” Well, you’re correct! Our Kickstarter campaign was a resounding success thanks to the generosity of our amazing supporters. We reached almost 200% of our goal at an unbelievable $85,440!Here’s a list of everything we have been able to do so far with our increased funding:
Bring FOUR new faces into the Pixel Sprout Studios family
Add the Elven world Nel’Vari into the game
Create space for TONS of additional quests and NPCs
 And while we were ecstatic with reaching this level of support, tons of people in our discord community were still hoping we’d reach that one last stretch goal. Now that our community is calling for it, we can’t help but answer!That’s right folks, we’re talking about MOUNTS!So many people wanted mounts in the game that our Director Bruce changed his mind on not including them. We were originally just using magic for quick movement around the world. But, due to so many player requests, we’re now looking to use both magic and mounts. Funnily enough, Bruce actually keeps a counter to track how many times the word “mount” is brought up in our Discord! Just take a look at our Mount Count™ below.  This campaign is our response to the community. The fans wanted it, so we chose to go the route of Indiegogo InDemand. Consider it an extension of the Kickstarter campaign, or basically just “finishing up” our Kickstarter campaign here on Indiegogo. The sole goal here is to get mounts into the game. But while we’re here, we may as well use this platform to show you what we’ve been up to in the meantime! If you saw our Kickstarter campaign, much of what lies ahead will be familiar - but not everything! We’ve sprinkled our newest assets and concepts throughout the page, so get scrolling and take a gander at the goods!  Withergate Mounts Concept Art.  Withergate Mask Reward! Pet Baby Dragon Reward!   ---  Pet Baby Tiger Reward!  Exclusive Sparkling Sun Dress!   ---   Exclusive Sparkling Sun Armor! Greetings, Adventurer! Welcome to Sun Haven, a trading town in the height of its prosperity! … Well, it used to be. Frankly, Sun Haven has seen better days. Traffic through town has been low lately due to rumors of monsters on the road. The citizens of Sun Haven have stayed afloat so far, but nobody has been able to return the city to its former glory – and this is where you come in.While working to revive the town, you can be whoever you want to be. Try your hand at farming, mining, fishing, fighting as a warrior, or honing your magic power as a mage. The decision is entirely yours. Your skills will grow with whatever you choose, whether you’re raising crops and animals, engaging in RPG-style questlines, or even pursuing romantic relationships. And your skills only get stronger as you level up!In your exploration, you may find yourself in the forests outside of Sun Haven. As you delve deeper into these woods, there's a change to the energy in the air. You swear you heard the trees whispering around you, but that can't be, unless...  you've found the entrance to the enchanted city of Nel'Vari! Take time to convene with the forest, learn about the Elves, and you might be deemed worthy of entry.It seems like no matter where you go, though, one thing remains the same – dark rumors of monsters. You know that somewhere nearby Sun Haven is the monster city of Withergate. Rumors are that strange creatures have been flocking to this city. Could this be why people are staying off the roads lately? An urgent request befalls you, and now you must decide if you will heed the rumors or seek the truth yourself…But in all your adventuring, don't forget to take a break and gather your strength! There is always time between quests to relax and nurture your farm. Take some time to engage with your new community. Maybe you can even get a meal with the dashing doctor on the other side of town!Sun Haven’s level progression system has taken shape in the form of an RPG-style skill/talent tree. As your skills grow on your adventures, you will receive points to invest in yourself however you see fit. You choose where to focus your growth, what your specialty will be, and what kind of adventurer you will become.That’s enough just talking about skills, go ahead and take a look at some of the skills you can invest in below!  FarmingFarming in Sun Haven is unlike farming in any other game. As lovers of farming sim games, we're committed to delivering a charming and refreshing new take on the genre. On release, we expect to ship with around 50 kinds of crops including the classics like corn, potatoes, and the like. But Sun Haven is a fantasy game as much as a farming game after all, so we’re going beyond the classics with some added specialties that will bring the spice back to an age-old gameplay staple like farming. Here are some of our current design concepts we think you'll enjoy (or remember from the video!):  A Few Crop Designs:

Gem Seed Crop: Plant a gem seed that produces gems later (so you don't have to accidentally fall in cave lava for the second time this week!)

Snappy Crop: Plant seeds that jump up and down when planted and watered (they're alive!). When they fully grow, they occasionally snap at players passing by

Forest Nut Crop: Passively attracts more forest wildlife like deer to your farm! Deer would drop antlers for you to use in crafting! 

Magic Acorn Crop: Passively attracts more squirrels to hang out on your farm. Squirrels would drop nuts or other collectibles for you!
Watch out for the Jumping Seeds... you never know what might sprout!If you prefer ranching to farming, don’t worry! Animal lovers will have lots of options for their fantasy ranch, too. There are plenty of animals to raise in your barn - including some unconventional choices such as monster animals from Withergate and magical, exotic creatures from Nel’Vari! Potential Withergate Farm Animals:

Silk Moth: Drops silk, which is used to make cloth

Gem Frog: Grows and drops gems

Mimic Treasure Chest: Drops one random item from the game everyday

Baby Griffon: Produces griffon eggs and feathers

Loyal Werewolf: Fetches a random crafting item every once in a while
Farming Summary:
A multitude of crops including monster crops from Withergate
Fertilizers to boost your farm’s output
Farming spells to speed things up even more
Upgradable farm
Barn for your farm animal family
 Some crops taste good and some crops taste YOU!​All that hard work paid off!Can you find all four animals in this pen?  MiningMining in Sun Haven has a sense of adventure, progress, and accomplishment. We want mining to be a relaxing way to discover hidden treasures and unique items to bring back to your farm.In open-world games, it’s important to add more than just space to explore, but also a variety of environments to keep you interested. We’re investing in this idea, even when it comes to our mines.Mines and underground caverns are a great place to improve art and aesthetic (not to mention lore!). So, we’re treating it the same way we would treat any other environment. To hit that adventuresome vibe, we’re making unique underground rivers, wild plant life, magma flows, and shiny gems all specially stylized to this aesthetic. The only thing you won’t find in the mines is a player bed! Mining Summary:
Multiple mines throughout the world to explore 
Gems and ores to use in smithing your next armor set (yes, the gems too!)
Mining spells to optimize your trips
Minecarts to help you get into the mines
       Gems (so sparkly)!  --- Mining made easy with magic.Your "home office"! FishingA Croc's got to eat! Fishing in Sun Haven feels like a relaxing and light challenge. The “hook” is that you never know what you're going to catch next! We currently have over 44 fish available in fishable oceans, rivers, and lakes. To give you a better idea, check out the highlight reel:
Pufferfish
Popeyed Goldfish
Hooked Bottle (contains letters, lore, or quests)
Sharks
Ribbon Eel
Golden Trash Boot! 
While we're still building it, we also plan on having a "museum" type system just for fishing. We call it the Fishing Sanctuary, an aquarium for you to keep your fishy friends safe. The sanctuary is curated by Pete, Sun Haven’s veteran fisherman and Lighthouse operator. You'll collect rare fish from Sun Haven, Withergate, and Nel’Vari to help Pete with his goal of completing the sanctuary. And don’t forget to lend Pete your ear as he recounts tales from the sea. With over 30 years of sailing and storytelling under his belt, they’re sure to be good! One fish down, DOZENS to go!The sea is full of surprises - like golden boots and bottled messages!Fishing Summary:
Rivers, ponds, lakes, oceans, even tropical islands to fish from
Use fish for cooking or to add to your personal collection
Catch each type of fish to earn special rewards
 CookingCooking in Sun Haven feels cozy, warm, novel, and selfless. We want players to relish in their cooking no matter what’s on the menu. There is a community aspect to cooking in Sun Haven. This approach is managed through the “Leftovers” feature.When crafting certain meals, there will be a chance to get an EXTRA meal (non-consumable by the player who made them). This meal is gift-able to NPCs and other players in the game, which will either give your friend a nice boost for their adventure or help you make some fast (and full) friends in town! Cooking Summary:
48 different recipes and counting
Save leftovers for neighbors and allies
Grow ingredients for use in cooking or buy them from the shop
Give meals as gifts to impress your neighbors and increase relationships
Bring meals on your adventures to give you a boost in times of need
 What's for lunch? Fish and rice! The Chef's Hat doesn't make you a better cook, but it sure feels like it does.Someone say.... Leftovers??  CombatCombat in Sun Haven melds challenge, skill, and fluidity. Farming sim games in the past have generally come with the price tag of stiff movement. Sun Haven is bringing elements from platformer games to make character inputs smoother - especially during combat. In our game, you'll be able to jump, dash midair, and attack all at the same time. This means that if you optimize correctly, you should be able to move while attacking almost constantly. Just watch out when using those heavy two handed swords!The depth of weapons, armor, and spells is sure to suit your playstyle no matter what it is. Ranged combat, melee combat, and magical combat are all very viable paths to keep the cutting edge over your foes. Level up! Sun Haven’s monster compendium will have you itching to reach those upper levels of combat. In terms of monster diversity, we're working through 30-50 enemy concepts that will be placed all throughout the world for you to face. Because of the flexibility Sun Haven’s setting provides, we’re able to really go outside the box here. Between the monster town, Elven town, and medieval Human town, there’s plenty of room for enemies of all kinds.The main storyline includes 3 planned story bosses to defeat. Outside of those bosses, there are roaming bosses throughout the world that might be encountered at any time! So make sure to pick up every item you can get along your journey - you never know when you might need it… Combat Summary:
Melee combat (swords, two-handed swords, flails, axes)
Ranged combat (with crossbows!)
Magic combat (spells including fireballs and chain lightning!)
An array of armor to buy or smith yourself
A range of monsters depending on your terrain
Legendary boss monsters
Zap 'em with the Chain Lighting Spell! Watch out for the leaves, they're.... dangerously cute?Legendary heroes need legendary armor!RomanceRomance in Sun Haven feels dynamic and interactive. As you grow deeper roots into your community, your relationships will develop naturally as with anyone in life – we're talking about real friendship here!Dynamic dialogue options will affect how your neighbors get along with you. Be an attentive conversationalist to make fast friends!With 16 romance-able NPCs including 10 Humans, 4 Demons, and 2 Elves, you’re bound to find your match somewhere. Seek your partner out by talking to people in town and getting to know them all individually, then take them on dates to see if you really click. And when the time comes, you can take your partnership to the next level. Get married and live with your perfect match – regardless of gender!Our romance system is something we’re giving a lot of attention to. By the time we release Sun Haven in May, we expect to have over 1000 pages of character dialogue. This content is how your connections will blossom just as they would in real life - by engaging with people on a personal level.  Bonus: if you’re both wearing your wedding rings then you will get this cute heart effect when you pass by each other! Phoebe likes pie!  ---  Catherine, too! Romance Summary:
16 Romance-able NPCs - including Elven and Demon options!
Dialogue-based reward system - earn quests and gifts by interacting with your neighbors
Dynamic conversation - paying the right compliment will land you in someone's good graces, but saying the wrong thing could get you the cold shoulder
Build complex relationships - gifts and small talk will only get you so far here; genuinely engaging in conversation is the best way to fan the flames of romance
Date system - choose a date spot and play your cards right to make some major progress on your relationships
Marry your real life partner in game! 
Oh and before we move along too quickly, we want to showcase a couple new characters we were unable to unveil in our previous Kickstarter campaign. Grab your inhalers and paper bags, people, it’s time to meet our Elven heartthrobs - Iris and Vaan!    IrisIris is an Elven enchanter in Nel’Vari. Nature is central to her work, experimenting and discovering things about how nature and magic interact. Proudly independent, she values weighing options and making a choice of her own.  VaanVaan is an Elven air mage living by his own moral code. He indulges his free-spirit by spending time in the wind above the trees, trusting emotion to guide him. Elusive and whimsical, he feels he doesn’t really belong to any society. Don't be late to meet your date!16 romanceable characters. Just three of the eligible heartthrobs in our game! The Center of Sun Haven Town! You’ve just arrived in Sun Haven, your new home. After your arrival, you receive a warm welcome in the tavern by the townsfolk. A lively evening ends with Sun Haven’s Archmage - a powerful fire mage named Lucia - lighting your way home before calling it a night. You retire for the night as well… until you’re awoken by a voice in the dark.Who could that be?A mysterious energy manifests in your home and leads you to a wishing well not far from town. The well pulses with a potent magic and you feel a vibrant energy building within yourself.What is this strange power?It isn’t until you make the journey to Dragon’s Meet that you get some clarity. There rests the Sun Dragon Elios, guardian and protector of Sun Haven. Elios senses an ancient power inside you, but it’s up to you to hone your abilities and unlock your magical potential - the fortune of Sun Haven may depend on it.Will you answer the Sun Dragon’s call?Your journey through Sun Haven’s story will put your abilities to the test. Use your wits to solve puzzles and unlock new worlds. When facing powerful story bosses, you may conquer them through combat or negotiate a peaceful solution. Secret treasures are just waiting to be discovered by anyone willing to dive deep into lore and myth. By scouring the vast world, you can find rare resources to be repurposed into powerful gear for your next quest. Most importantly, learn to harness the inherent power within yourself and battle the mysterious darkness spreading across the land.But every hero needs a home, after all. By immersing yourself in Sun Haven’s warm fellowship, you’ll see that strength can also be found in community. As a farmer, you have the chance to boost Sun Haven’s prosperity with your own sweat. The crops and animals you raise will benefit Sun Haven’s growth and your crafted goods may even bring new trade to town. All the while, your home becomes more your own with every hand-picked decoration you choose. Once your place is fully furnished, why not finally invite that shy baker over for a meal?Adventure belongs to the bold, and community to the noble. In Sun Haven, you will have both!    All right adventurer, it's time you met Elios. But first, a little history…In the beginning, dragons dominated the land and people stayed hidden in the dark corners of the world. Because of their tiny presence - and because they hid themselves from the dangers of the world - people went unnoticed by the dragons for many years. However, there came a time when people and dragons were brought together by circumstance. A Human village tucked inside a forest was discovered by a dragon during a raging firestorm - a storm that the dragon itself caused. Realizing that the little Humans would not survive the storm, this dragon shielded them under its wing out of mercy. It wasn’t known by the Humans then, but most dragons are not naturally malicious. In actuality, they are considerate and intelligent beings. Soon after that event, dragons realized that their immense power was endangering vulnerable civilizations of people and they took pity on them. At that, there was a turning point. Dragons decided to help people thrive and took on noble roles as guardians of cities and villages all over the world. In doing so, dragons established a peaceful era to the benefit of all living beings. The virtuous dragons have upheld this service for thousands of years, and continue it to this day.Elios is the guardian of Sun Haven. He claims the title of Sun Dragon and vigilantly protects the town from his vantage point on Dragon's Meet. The journey to Dragon's Meet is a dangerous ascent crawling with monsters, but if you can brave the trek to his mountainous refuge then you will have earned Elios's blessing. A blessing like that means different things for different people - what will it mean for you?By his presence alone, Elios brings goodwill to Sun Haven. The magical energy surrounding him is enough to bring growth to crops, health to animals, and clean flowing waters. However, it is when the Sun Dragon bestows his blessing to an individual person that we see the true effect of a dragon's magic. By imprinting his magical energy on someone, Elios unlocks the true abilities hidden in that person’s soul. In this same way, Elios gives you your first magical spell.Elios senses something ancient and mysterious in you, a power somehow familiar to him and yet unlike anything seen in a human before. Will you join Elios on Dragon's Meet to earn his blessing and unlock your fortune?   Elios the Sun Dragon - Guardian of Sun Haven   Let me tell you about the Elven city of Nel'Vari…Nel'Vari is an Elven town hidden in the deep forests west of Sun Haven. This enigmatic place is guarded by a secret puzzle that will test your knowledge of Elven culture. Only those familiar with Elven society can find entry, that way the Elves keep out anyone seeking to disrespect their way of life.The Elves have based their lifestyle heavily on the natural world. Eternally grateful and reverent to the power of nature, they build their structures among the plants and animals instead of clearing forests for their homes. The guardian dragon of the Elven town is Nivara. Her deep connection to the natural world makes her a wise and valuable resource for the Elves of Nel’Vari, who have based their entire existence around her teachings regarding the energy that connects all life.Nel'Vari is also home to unique forms of magic and crafting. Elven mages work with magic to discover the secrets of nature. Their research fuels Elven culture and society, keeping them in harmony with the ecosystem that gives them life. This balance sustains the forest from which they take their resources so the forest may thrive alongside Elven society. Elves are also master artisans and use nature’s resources to craft the finest woodworks. Elven woodworking is regarded as the highest quality craftsmanship in the world.What can you learn from the Elves? Will you humble yourself to Nivara’s teachings? Can you solve the puzzle and earn your entry into the enchanted city of Nel'Vari?  Nel'Vari  Early Concept Art.                   Vaan's House!  ---  Iris's House! Nel'Vari Grand Tree Concept Art.    When the sky stays dark, you can be sure you've reached the rumored monster town of Withergate! Compared to many towns, Withergate is a more technologically advanced city. It is home to a diverse population of monsters and unique creatures who have pooled their knowledge and talents together to thrive. Here, you can discover more concentrated magic, purchase monster crop seeds, or even try your hand at romance with a Lycan or two.Withergate is a world where individuals of all shapes and sizes decided to work together. Here, bookkeepers at the library are tall Cyclops (who else can grab books from the top shelf for you?), the local tailor is a silk spinning spider, and the local haberdasher has three heads for modeling his wears! Withergate's seamstress and  haberdasher! The City of Darkness is ruled by the fierce Demon King, a figure known even to the fearful Humans in Sun Haven. The royal bloodline has been in power for generations - which is a very long time for Demons! Upon entry, you’re brought to face this powerful Demon in his throne room. Let’s hope you stay on his good side...Make no mistake, Withergate is our big bet in trying to revamp the farming sim genre. By leaving the lights off, we’re able to really show off some magic and glowing effects that wouldn’t look the same in the daylight. This also allows us to support some special members in our cast who prefer the night life (see our Spectral Knight and Ghost Girl characters in the video!). Additionally, Withergate will be home to a monster carnival with games and attractions for all the creatures of the night! Your new buddy awaits you in the pet shop! Donovan, Spectral Knight, and the Ghost Girl livin' that night life! A lovely night for a stroll through the spooky forest.   A fun game is a game with variety. Sun Haven’s customization offers a ton of variety with over 20 skin colors and dozens of eye combinations for your original character’s creation. There are plenty of other options for each of the 7 playable races with no restrictions based on gender!As an Angel, you'll mix and match your halos to your wings until you've found the perfect pair. Demons of course have plenty of tails and horns to choose from. Not to mention the in-depth customization offered by the Amari race – from birds, dogs, lizards, and aquatic animal parts at your disposal, you're certain to find a combination that suits you. By the time we're done, you'll have no problem creating your unique aesthetic. Just be yourself! Race options galore! Rest assured, we've got you covered with customization outside of character building as well. Your home can be upgraded up to 3 tiers to give you plenty of room to stretch out. By the time we're finished with development, there will be hundreds of decorative items to choose from. Furthermore, we aren't restricting furniture placement by snapping it to floor tiles. Instead, the decoration is done with free placement so you can really dial it in when setting up your home base.Free placement makes decorating a snap. Furthermore, if we hit our stretch goals then both Withergate and Nel’Vari will include space for a home and farm of your very own. That’s right, you can party it up every night in Withergate, the City of Darkness! Or if you’re really trying to cleanse yourself of negative energies these days, you might find balance between your life and all life around you by immersing yourself in the Elven culture of Nel’Vari.Still not convinced? Or, convinced but just craving more? Let us break it down for you:
7 different playable races - Demon, Angel, Elf, Naga, Elemental, Human, and the animal race Amari
Highly customizable appearance - create an avatar that represents whoever you want to be
Customizable homes in all three worlds (if we hit those stretch goals!) - a well-decorated home can increase your social standing with your neighbors
Pets - choose a buddy to join you on your adventures
IF THIS CAMPAIGN IS A SUCCESS - Mounts to carry you along your journey
 Even your pet has their own aesthetic.Not just dogs and cats here - clouds make great pets, too!Pet Concept Arts.Who says it's weird to have three refrigerators?Player race variations...and counting!  You’re certain to face many challenges on your journey in Sun Haven, but you don’t have to face them alone!Your friends and fellow adventurers can join your town to aid your quest. We’re designing the game for multiplayer from the get-go so you and your friends can jump into the adventure together right away. We expect to support up to 8 heroes together at once on one player-hosted server. Adventuring, treasure-seeking, farming, and making a life for yourself is always easier - and more fun - with back up!We’re accounting for the immensity of 8-player multiplayer wherever we can. To start, we’re developing a multiplayer game mode with a larger starting farm space for all of your friends to spread out comfortably. Furthermore, we’re toying with the concept of respawning treasure chests in the wild to encourage exploration for all involved players. Farming is better with friends... like 7 of them! A big part of Sun Haven is the unique and magical Wish-Granting mechanic. With this ability, you have the power to make real change by granting wishes. With a Wish, you can make impassable obstacles disappear or help a neighbor find a new home. This power belongs to you alone, so it’s your decision how you’ll use it to help the town. Harness your power to make Wishes come true! Wishes Summary:
Bring new shops to town
Increase the number of goods sold in shops
Help neighbors in need to maintain your community
And for goodness sake, wish the sick puppy back to health!
 Make a Wish! Pre-Wish Café vs Post-Wish Café!   Take a peek at these various concepts and WIPs.Our art speaks for itself, but that doesn’t mean it can’t be explained a little bit.Like many other sim games, we started with 16x16 pixel per unit resolution. But then we decided that just wouldn’t cut it. We want this game to look amazing, so we stepped up the visual aesthetic. To make sure our magical effects would really shine, we bumped the resolution up to 24x24 - that’s 225% of the old pixel density and, well, the results speak for themselves: One of these things is not like the other...Withergate Pumpkin Monster, as featured in the video! Anne's House concept art - or more like concept cart! Watercolor concepts of the Wishing Well  and the Player Home starting area. We agreed that the best way to capture the whimsical and relaxing atmosphere of Sun Haven would be to create its music from scratch using the sounds of real instruments, so that’s how we’re doing it - with no old school pixel-y or arcade-y sounds. All of the music and sound effects in Sun Haven are being composed in-house from the ground up by our talented Sound Designer, Alex (see his handsome mug at the bottom of the page!). Below, you can listen to some of his work. Here we have 2 versions of one of our themes - one concept and one (slightly) more polished iteration.Check them out here: The beautiful track you're listening to is one of the concepts for the Winter Festival event, just one of the town events we're hoping to create in Sun Haven. When we were planning for the game originally, we wrote a story for what the first 20 minutes of gameplay would feel like (Day 1 of Spring), and what the last 20 minutes of the first gameplay year would feel like (ending with the town's Winter Festival). What you're listening to is one of the concepts for what we might want the conclusion of year 1 to feel like. Can you feel it?This cow is in the moo-d for the season!  Hey all! It's Bruce, the Director for Sun Haven writing this section!For the last year, I've paid for everything out of pocket by saving up where I could over the last few years. With a bit of hard work and some extra hours each week, I am neatly and indefinitely able to staff a core functioning team to complete this project. So, to be clear: Sun Haven WILL release IN MAY. Period.In terms of funding support at this point, increased support means we will reliably be able to deliver on all these gems, sparkles, and scope of the game in time.Currently, we’ve already finished our last hiring spree (picking up FOUR new sprouts in the studio!) and I believe we’ve done this right on track for the development curve of completing Sun Haven on time. As both a director and a player dying to play a new farming sim with my friends, I would much rather a studio hire an extra person or two ahead of time to make sure the game comes out great, and on time-- so that’s exactly what we’ve done.While we CAN eventually ship a full scoped Sun Haven over time, I think what’s best for players is getting the chance to play the full scoped game right at release.(If you're gonna put magic, dragons, fantasy, quests, and two worlds into a farming sim... you can't just go halfway, right?)The dev side of things for us right now (outside of marketing) is pushing to flesh out our Alpha versions as fast as we can-- As such, I would say this game will be shippable by the end of this month, December. In terms of early access, we probably won't do early access because we really want the game to have its full vision when players first get their hands on it. I'd hate to come off as developers that aren't thoughtful in execution just because we didn’t allow ourselves enough time to polish a beta version of the game we’d later throw away.Our 14 person team needs community support to make Sun Haven the fantastic game at the scope that includes everything that we (and players) have been wanting. And to make this game at the scope that's going to fully satisfy the farming sim AND the RPG elements, we're going to need to make enough quests, items, and thoughtfully immersive settings for the combat and worldbuilding. Please help us make our dream game the absolute best it can be!In terms of actual financial breakdown, the allocation of funds received by our very attractive backers would look like this:Where Funds will be allocated!   Thanks so much for your support!- The Pixel Sprout Studios Team  SOCIALSOur Site: https://pixelsproutstudios.com/Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/SunHavenDiscord: http://discord.gg/BqTCygETwitter: https://twitter.com/SunHavenRPGInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/sunhavenrpg/Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=1089564...Tumblr: https://sunhavenrpg.tumblr.com/Pinterest:https://www.pinterest.com/SunHavenRPG/ Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ here, on the discord, or read more on the website!

story:
Big thank you to everyone who has supported us!

The IndieGoGo InDemand campaign is now closed, but the game and various perks, both digital bonuses and physical goodies, can still be preordered on our

Official website!

(Alternative link)

 

Set in the Eighties, Japan, "Love, Money, Rock'n'Roll" is a visual novel combining mystery, drama, romance, and, of course, rock'n'roll into an immersive story full of love, intrigues, music, betrayal, and self-sacrifice. 

It features dozens of hours of gameplay with a multitude of choices that define the development of the story; four heroines, each with her own story, temper, and several possible endings. We try to take the best from Japanese visual novels and bring something new, something of our own to the genre as well. 

To ensure the best possible flexibility and performance, we use Unity3D as our game engine. LMRnR is planned for release on Windows (including Steam), Windows Phone, Linux, MacOS, iOS, Android, and as a web-version simultaneously.

"Love, Money, Rock'n'Roll" will contain more than 300000 words in its script, over 80 backgrounds, over 80 event CGs, and 3.5+ hours of music.

All spites (characters) in the full version of the game will be animated.

There will also be a separate version with additional (hentai) content released on the Nutaku platform at the same time. Our backers will have access to all of the game's content.

Want to know more about the development process so far and how we created the demo? Check out this article of ours on MadeWithUnity website!

 

 

The Eighties; the romanticism of the early rock’n’roll; the making of the trans-national corporations; the spirit of freedom and rebellion against society. Political intrigues, world unbound by the vice of globalization, and the birth of modern business model. The time when money could buy everything and meant nothing.  

The main character is a son of two engineers who emigrated to Japan from the Soviet Union when he was still little. After his parents' tragic death in a production incident, he has been living alone, attending a local school for foreigners and children from wealthy families. One day he gets caught in a whirlwind of events, intrigues, political schemes, and complex human relationships. Is he destined to get out of this storm unhurt, or will he be swept away by the hurricane of life that is more complicated and threatening than he could ever imagine?  

Immerse yourself in an engrossing story, find the secrets of the powerful Corporation and the purpose of the mysterious Project, choose your path and find your love. 

The three main artists working with us on "Love, Money, Rock'n'Roll" are ArseniXC, iCephei, and Simomark. Together, they create beautiful illustrations and define the visual aspect of the game. You can see some of their works below.

  Background animation example (WIP):

 Character animation example (WIP):

 

 

 

Working with several talented musicians and composers, we have already added more than three hours of music to our game, and by the end of development, we intend to have even more. Here you can listen to some of their tracks:

https://soundcloud.com/user-818071119/sets/love-money-rocknroll-demo-ost

 

If you want a different set of rewards, drop us a message and we'll work something out!

 

 

With most of the development funded by our own savings, Kickstarter is a way to give the realisation of our first commercial project its final push, create a high-quality English translation for the script, increase the flexibility of the project in terms of resources, and, in case the stretch goals are met, to even further increase the quality of the game and bring new, exciting features to it. To truly make it the game of our dreams. 

 

We are a young studio originating in Russia and with many people working with us throughout the world. We are dedicated to creating high-quality visual novels and we pour all of our hearts and souls into them.

You might be interested in taking a look at our first game, Everlasting Summer, that was a huge success and the most downloaded visual novel ever on Steam. It is free and will always be free.

 

Risks and challenges

We are a dedicated team of developers working hard to create the best possible experience for our players. With this first commercial product of ours, the greatest challenge for will be to fulfill the expectations of our fans and supporters. We have been and will continue to work full-time on this project to increase and uphold the quality of the game and to deliver it in time.

We have been and will continue to work full-time on this project to increase and uphold the quality of the game and to deliver it in time.

story:
OUR GAME

PERKS

Fritz FunTown Frysticks: You’ll get a thank you in the credits!

Freeze Brain Frozie Shake: You will gain early access to our completed game!
(In Addition to all Previous Perks)

Double Down Slam Burger Blast: 8x11 signed poster! (In Addition to all Previous Perks)

FunTown Tripolino Burger: A digital download of the soundtrack. 
(In Addition to all Previous Perks)

Rigsby’s Spice-a-Chino:  A digital download of all concept art! (In Addition to all Previous Perks)

FunTown Mega Bunzos:  Your face will appear in the game!
(In Addition to all Previous Perks)

Rigsby's Funzo Meal: A 3D printed Toy of your favorite game character!
(In Addition to all Previous Perks)

Funtown Manager: An official executive producer credit! Thank you so much!
(In Addition to all Previous Perks)


STRETCH GOALS

15k-  Survival Level

20k- Short Film Will be released of the game.

story:
Hi, I'm Brandon Santiago,

Creator of the web based Comic Erma. I started Erma in 2014 and thanks to the support I have gotten over the years it is still going to this day. The comic stars Erma, a little ghost girl as she goes to school, plays with friends, and does other activities a girl her age would do but in her own ghoulish ways.

I have wanted to move Erma into other mediums that I favor dearly, one of those being video games. This is where I need your help and support as my team and I take our first foray into this new undertaking with Erma: The Game. The game is a point and click adventure where you play as Erma as she searches her neighborhood of Blairwood for her science project gone awry.

My team and I have been working in pre-production for a while now with me doing the rough animation and my team doing the clean up and coloration which is why we need your help to make Erma: The Game reach it's full potential.

Any Help is Appreciated! 

Don't have the ability to help back us with money? That's fine, back us by getting the word out! Whether you tweet it to your followers, nag your friends to finally check out the ghoulish goodness of Erma, or even send out smoke signals to the hermits in the mountains ever little bit helps us. Erma has only been able to become so successful because of the continued support of you our reads and fans. So even if you can't fund us with money, we are more than happy if you just help spread the word about Erma in any way you can.
