More Beta Edition perks added
Developer Stream #3 - Music Soundscaping with Jean-Marc and Designer Eric Reuss

Developer Stream #2 - Q+A with Designer Eric Reuss and UI with John

Developer Stream #1 - Spirit Island Engine with David and Jean-Marc

 Campaign:In the most distant reaches of the world, magic still exists, embodied by spirits of the land, of the sky, and of every natural thing. As the great powers of Europe stretch their colonial empires further and further, they will inevitably lay claim to a place where spirits still hold power - and when they do, the land itself will fight back alongside the islanders who live there.Spirit Island is a cooperative settler-destruction strategy game designed by R. Eric Reuss and set in an alternate-history world around A.D. 1700. Players become different spirits of the land, each with their own unique elemental powers, forced to defend their island home from colonizing Invaders spreading blight and destruction. Your spirits work with the native islanders to increase your power and drive the invading colonists from your island in this strategic area-control game.Handelabra Games and Greater Than Games are once again uniting to bring an amazing cooperative game to the digital tabletop!In Spirit Island, players choose between 1-4 spirits to control. The number of spirits determines the size of the island. A single spirit game uses a single island board like this:*Pre-alpha screenshots. Subject to change before release.*Spirits start with limited options but grow in power over the course of the game. The Invaders will spread across the land, destroying Spirit Presence and Dahan, and Blighting the land. You will not be able to contain them forever.*Pre-alpha screenshots. Subject to change before release.*At the start of the game, Victory can only be obtained by obliterating all of the Invaders, which is extremely difficult! However, as you grow in power and escalate the fear in the hearts of the Invaders, progressively easier victory conditions will become available. The game ends immediately in Defeat if no more Blight is left in the Blight pool, if any player is knocked out of the game (by losing all Presence from the map), or if you take too long to rout the Invaders.*Pre-alpha screenshots. Subject to change before release.*Here's a short overview of how the game plays on the tabletop:..As you have come to expect from Handelabra Games, the digital version of Spirit Island is planned to be a faithful adaptation of the core game experience. Spirit Island for Steam is planned to cost $25 and include the following:

8 different Spirits, each with 4 Power Cards unique to that Spirit

Over 50 distinct Major and Minor Power Cards which Spirits can grow into
Modular Island map with 4 double-sided boards
Digital components representing the Invaders and Dahan (native islanders)

15 Invader cards, driving a distinctive Invader expansion system

15 Fear cards, showing what happens as you terrify the Invaders

3 multi-tier Adversaries (specific Invaders) for play variety and fine-tuned challenge: England, Brandenburg-Prussia, and Sweden

4 optional Scenarios for even more play variety
Local co-op play with 1-4 spirits

Interactive tutorial so you can learn the game while you play
Brand-new music composed by Jean-Marc Giffin

Windows, Mac, and Linux support
Steam Achievements

Steam Cloud Saves
All bonus features unlocked via the campaign
All the above are included with every perk that includes a Steam key for the game.The exclusive digital playmat is a cosmetic game background item that reflects your status as a backing supporter at the deluxe edition level and above.What does it mean to become a member of the beta team?Becoming a beta team member means you will get access to the private beta of the game via Steam ahead of any retail or Early Access launch. story:
The Omega Imperative is a game that we are developing with the golden age of games in mind. We grew up playing Nintendo, Super Nintendo, and Sega Genesis as kids and wanted to really capture that old-school feeling.  

The game is a blend of top-down adventure and space shoot-em-up games. One of the most prominent features is that abilities obtained in one game mode carry over to the other, offering a dual purpose for every new upgrade. Using this as our basic model we began working on interesting mechanics that would appeal to a more modern audience, taking notes from more recent titles.  


The Features  

  • 6 top down adventure areas with upgrades and secrets to find in the Omega Facility
  • 5 action packed vertical shooter levels to fight through with the Omega Drone
  • Over 20 enemy types in both game modes to test your skills, including epic boss fights
  • Combine the 5 Fusion Cores for 15 unique abilities to aid in fighting off the alien invasion
  • All abilities and upgrades are usable in both the Facility and Drone levels
  • Original retro soundtrack and pixel art will hit you right in the nostalgia feels.


The Inspiration

A lot of the inspiration for The Omega Imperative comes from a lesser-known, yet much beloved game on the classic Nintendo Entertainment System; a game known in the U.S as The Guardian Legend. That game was a fantastic blending of the top-down action adventure genre and the vertical scrolling shooter genre. The Omega Imperative aims very much to capture that same engaging and action-packed blending of genres, into one exhilarating game. This exciting fusion of genres is a great attribute to the overall uniqueness of our game.    

The design of The Omega Imperative is also significantly influenced by other classic games from the 8 and 16-bit eras. We have a genuine appreciation for the classics and we want to share that in the form of a quality title that we hope many can enjoy. We want to share that feeling that we had when we were kids, compelled by a great game to keep on playing until we had blisters on our thumbs.


The Funding

To make this project a reality we need your help. We came up with the modest figure of 4200 to fund this game. The money raised in this campaign will go toward paying publishing costs, production and development expenses, and hiring contracted artists. We have a vast network of creative people to draw upon to bring this game to a polished and complete state.

While we haven't included stretch goals, we are open to expand our scope if we do break our goal. The foremost mission is to gather support for a promise and scope we know we can deliver on before trying to branch further. That said, we'd very much like to publish to as many platforms as possible. Playing the game with a controller feels very natural, and it would be exiting to release on console markets if the community has interest. There are also many features on the cutting room floor that we would love to be able to add back in from a wake of overwhelming support.


The Designers

Mike Bonafede

Mike Bonafede grew up in a small town in western New York where he spent most of his time playing classic video games. His love for games came from his grandfather, who taught him how to play games of strategy like Chess at a young age. His love for entertainment came from his father, a musician, and helped foster his creativity.

After getting his associates degree in Multimedia Design he moved east and worked as a game tester for several years on titles like Guitar Hero and Marvel Ultimate Alliance 2 before moving on to pursue a bachelors in Game Design. Now an undergrad, he’s looking to use his talents to make games and put his skills to the test. With this project he seeks to join the community of independent developers in shaping the future of the game industry.

Mike Lamark

Mike Lamark was born and raised in southwestern Pennsylvania, and played his first Atari 2600 game when he was roughly 2 years old. That was the beginning of his lifelong passion for games, and as he got older and played more games, he became increasingly curious about how they were made. This intrigue and passion for games evoked in him his greatest dream and aspiration; to one day become a game designer.

With that goal ever-present in his mind, he decided to pursue a degree in game design. Now, after having earned his degree, he is putting his skill and knowledge to work to create a fun and exciting game experience that he can’t wait to share with everyone. For him, making games is the ultimate dream come true.

~

These two designers met at Full Sail University and immediately recognized that their skills, passions, and backgrounds aligned in that special blend that formed this dynamic duo. Now, here they are ready to take on the world with your help.   Check out this interview on Obsolete Gamer for more about us!

The Promise  

We are simple game designers of humble means trying to break into the game industry to share our passion with the community and world. With your help we can make this dream come true, and will pledge to make the best experience we can for you. We are here to work hard to earn support. Thank you for your time.


The Rewards

Here are a few of the rewards we have lined up for our supporters. Some of them aren't ready to show off yet so until then you'll just have to stay tuned!



Risks & Challenges

The game industry is a very risky market, and requires a special kind of determination to break into. We have that determination. We also have not just the passion to make a great game, but the hard skills it takes to actually do it. As designers, we are 100% confident in our abilities to bring this game to market. 

Thankfully, we have both production and publishing experience to draw on, having helped ship titles on consoles and even bring a few mobile games to market. We are no strangers to the industry. Starting on our own path feels like the next logical step.

 The aliens have tamed vicious bugs from their home world

With your help we can make this dream come true, and will pledge to make the best experience we can for you. We are here to work hard to earn support. Thank you for your time.

The Rewards
Here are a few of the rewards we have lined up for our supporters. Some of them aren't ready to show off yet so until then you'll just have to stay tuned!



$300- A pixel mosaic of our brave hero, Kobayashi

 $200- Custom made game cartridge flash drive




    Risks & Challenges  
The game industry is a very risky market, and requires a special kind of determination to break into. We have that determination. We also have not just the passion to make a great game, but the hard skills it takes to actually do it. As designers, we are 100% confident in our abilities to bring this game to market. 
Thankfully, we have both production and publishing experience to draw on, having helped ship titles on consoles and even bring a few mobile games to market. We are no strangers to the industry. Starting on our own path feels like the next logical step.

story:
Hi everyone!

Cats Who Play Company proudly presents Syrian Warfare, a game based on real events that take place in the Middle East at the moment. Events hugely important and significant.

So, why Syria, and why now?

Games nowadays are not just fun. They represent another medium, another way to convey information to the audience, often more approachably than even most detailed analytical articles and news stories. We want to use this medium to show what has happened in the Middle East and what is happening now.

Our goal is not to push propaganda, but tell a real story through a good game.

We want to make a game showing significance of the brave battle of the civilized world against the evil, and we think we are on the right track!

Why are we collecting money?

We are not new to the industry, and we realise that creating good games costs money. If you want your game to reach out to a wider audience, it has to be of exceptional quality. Our current budget allows us to release a basic version of the game. However, with your help we can make the product better in terms of graphics and details, raise its overall quality, extend missions and units, and add extra sounds and music.

We would like to mention that we have chosen a flexible funding, but each backer will get the game's Steam key and other rewards, according to their chosen "perk", no matter whether we achieve the stated goal to raise funds or not.

Note: It took less one week for Syrian Warfare to get "greenlight" on Steam Greenlight!

Some of our projects

What kind of a game is it?

Syrian Warfare is a real time strategy with a high degree of realism. This game is not about a base construction or units production. The player will have to determine their forces characteristics before they go into action. And during the mission they would be able to select reinforcements in order to support the troopers.

The troops and machinery crews move from mission to mission and gain experience, which helps them increase their effectiveness.

Trophies captures by the player on the battlefield can be used throughout the whole campaign.

Importantly enough, there are no «life bars» for vehicles in the game. Damages are calculated by taking into account the protection module and the power of adverse factors. Inflicted damages affect the functioning of the module.

In the battle field, it is impossible to repair the armor, but one can repair the modules by using a limited stock of spare parts.

By the way, ammunition and fuel are also limited.

A system of high-quality physical demolition of buildings and other objects is used in the game (it does not only look spectacular, but it has a serious influence on the tactics during the missions, especially in urban areas).


The game has a wide set of tactical possibilities: storming of buildings,usage of smokescreens, infantry lift by helicopters and APC/IFV, air strike calls, capturing of trophy weapons and equipment, usage of heat flares and active defence complexes.

And of course the story itself. We will try to show the conflict not from a point of view of a general, located somewhere at the ‘top’. No, it will be a story of a man, who lived in the country that descended into hell. A story of struggle, loss and regained hope.

This game does not claim to be a history lesson, but it shows the course of the war in all its seriousness through the major milestones, from the first days till the latest important victories over terror.


When will the game be released?

We plan to release the game in autumn via Steam (for Windows OS). We are already mapping out the missions, gradually completing the graphics and will soon start recording the sound.

Preliminary system requirements:

Minimum:
OS: Windows 7/8/10
Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) / AMD A10 5800k (3.8 GHz)
Memory: 3 GB RAM
Graphics: GeForce GT 440 (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 4890 (1024 MB)
Hard Drive: 10 GB

Recommended:
OS: Windows 7/8/10
Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) / AMD A10 5800k (3.8 GHz)
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 (2048 MB) / Radeon R9 270X (2048 MB)
Hard Drive: 10 GB

How can you help?

We are counting on your support! If you are not willing to invest in our venture, please tell your friends about the project and use the Indiegogo share tools for make some noise about it.

That way we can realize our masterplan! Let's give it a go!
story_txt:
Hi everyone!
Cats Who Play Company proudly presents Syrian Warfare, a game based on real events that take place in the Middle East at the moment. Events hugely important and significant.So, why Syria, and why now?Games nowadays are not just fun. They represent another medium, another way to convey information to the audience, often more approachably than even most detailed analytical articles and news stories. We want to use this medium to show what has happened in the Middle East and what is happening now.Our goal is not to push propaganda, but tell a real story through a good game. We want to make a game showing significance of the brave battle of the 
civilized world against the evil, and we think we are on the right track!Why are we collecting money?We are not new to the industry, and we realise that creating good games costs money. If you want your game to reach out to a wider audience, it has to be of exceptional quality. Our current budget allows us to release a basic version of the game. However, with your help we can make the product better in terms of graphics and details, raise its overall quality, extend missions and units, and add extra sounds and music.We would like to mention that we have chosen a flexible funding, but each backer will get the game's Steam key and other rewards, according to their chosen "perk", no matter whether we achieve the stated goal to raise funds or not.Note: It took less one week for Syrian Warfare to get "greenlight" on Steam Greenlight!

Some of our projects


What kind of a game is it?
Syrian Warfare is a real time strategy with a high degree of realism. This game is not about a base construction or units production. The player will have to determine their forces characteristics before they go into action. And during the mission they would be able to select reinforcements in order to support the troopers.
The troops and machinery crews move from mission to mission and gain experience, which helps them increase their effectiveness.
Trophies captures by the player on the battlefield can be used throughout the whole campaign.
Importantly enough, there are no «life bars» for vehicles in the game. Damages are calculated by taking into account the protection module and the power of adverse factors. Inflicted damages affect the functioning of the module. In the battle field, it is impossible to repair the armor, but one can 
repair the modules by using a limited stock of spare parts.By the way, ammunition and fuel are also limited.A system of high-quality physical demolition of buildings and other objects is used in the game (it does not only look spectacular, but it has a serious influence on the tactics during the missions, especially in urban areas). 
The game has a wide set of tactical possibilities: storming of buildings,usage of smokescreens, infantry lift by helicopters and APC/IFV, air strike calls, capturing of trophy weapons and equipment, usage of heat flares and active defence complexes.


And of course the story itself. We will try to show the conflict not from a point of view of a general, located somewhere at the ‘top’. No, it will be a story of a man, who lived in the country that descended into hell. A story of struggle, loss and regained hope. This game does not claim to be a history lesson, but it shows the 
course of the war in all its seriousness through the major milestones, 
from the first days till the latest important victories over terror.When will the game be released?
We plan to release the game in autumn via Steam (for Windows OS). We are already mapping out the missions, gradually completing the graphics and will soon start recording the sound.Preliminary system requirements:Minimum:        OS: Windows 7/8/10        Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) / AMD A10 5800k (3.8 GHz)        Memory: 3 GB RAM        Graphics: GeForce GT 440 (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 4890 (1024 MB)        Hard Drive: 10 GB     Recommended:        OS: Windows 7/8/10        Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) / AMD A10 5800k (3.8 GHz)        Memory: 8 GB RAM        Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 (2048 MB) / Radeon R9 270X (2048 MB)        Hard Drive: 10 GB 
How can you help?

 We are counting on your support! If you are not willing to invest in our venture, please tell your friends about the project and use the Indiegogo share tools for make some noise about it. 
That way we can realize our masterplan! Let's give it a go!

story:
** All prizes are sponsored by TRAVAGA Network, one of network marketing team from Surabaya, Indonesia. Special thanks to Henri Gunawan, founder of TRAVAGA Network, for his generosity.




We believe that network marketing is one of the greatest business plans on earth in the present global economy. This is because network marketing makes it possible for anybody to start a home-based business with small amount of money. 

Its compensation plan is also exceptional. It allows leaders who have already succeeded in their businesses to support their downlines or groups. In short, you become successful by helping other people to get successful too.

If we get support from leaders who are already successful, there are high chances for us to become successful too, right?

Logically, yes that's true, but in the practical world, the reality is not that simple. Here's why :

We've experienced this problem ourselves and seen it in our friends and even family. 

This is why we started the Sociyo project. Our intention is to connect more and more successful people to become mentors to their downlines and help them with valuable information until they can change their own lives.

Using Sociyo is very simple. You can start by searching or inviting your uplines or downlines. When you find people you know, add them 'as downline' or 'as upline' and when they approve your request, you'll see them on your network tree.

Once you're connected with people you know, you'll be able to send them messages, see their updates or even learn new marketing technique from them.

Imagine yourself as upline : With Sociyo, now you can reach your downlines to an unlimited level of depth. You can see their faces; you can see what they're doing; and you can give them new marketing skills or product information. You can nurture them using the device that's already in your hand. You can help them change their lives! And of course, if you help more people succeed in network marketing, you will achieve your own success too.

Imagine yourself as a downline : If you're new to the network marketing business, the support from uplines is very important. They are great people who are willing to spend their time helping you from zero until you can make your first sale. Now, imagine something greater than that. With Sociyo installed on your phone, you can track many of your 'ancestors' and you will be able to learn how to succeed more intensely with them.

Imagine yourself as network marketer : If the network marketing industry increases its success rate as more uplines get connected with their downlines, can you imagine what other people would say about this business? That's right... They will describe network marketing using great words, and they will see this industry differently.

Be part of this project and let's make a great impact in network marketing… together.

Some people who we know on network marketing, including ourselves, promised their children, spouses or parents that they would change their lives forever. Unfortunately, some of them chose to give up down the line for lack of tools to help them achieve their dreams.

We just can't let them fail and get back to their daily jobs while we have something that can help them. No, we can't... It’s frustrating to see other people's hopes get dashed like that simply because we don’t have enough money to fund this project.

That's why we need your support to make their hopes, their dreams and maybe yours too, remain alive.

This is not our first project. We developed a small project in 2012, named Emivo. It's a Web-based project that is particularly focused on providing an appropriate site building platform for network marketers.

We want to take what we have learned from the Emivo project to next level. We want to help more people by creating a FREE app for all, which we have named Sociyo.

Currently, we're funding this project from our own pockets. We have spent our time doing research and making concept of this app. We have also done the programming codes on the server side. 

However, to accelerate the development process, include additional features and carry maintenance or updates in the future, we need to hire more full time programmers. 

We tried to outsource this project last month but did not find those who could fulfill our standards. So, the best way to do this is by having full-time programmers on our side. 

We also want to take this project seriously, which means we want to provide updates and more features to run network marketing more easily in the future.

For us, this is not just about making a great app but it's a mission to make our friends, family and other people out there become successful in achieving their dreams in the network marketing business.

You can help us by spreading the word about this campaign in many different ways. Here are just some examples of what you can do :

  1. Share this campaign to your Facebook, Twitter and Google+ friends.
  2. You can also inform your uplines or downlines via email. Tell them that this campaign needs their support too.
  3. Post to your blog. If you're a blogger, kindly make a post to your own blog about the impact of this campaign to the network marketing business.

If you have any question about this contest, feel free to contact us by email : ask@sociyo.com.

We have several plans and features to be executed in months ahead to make this project more complete than you see it today. We can push the development process as long as we have more programmers to hire. 

When we reach a certain level of donation, here's what you will have in return :


We have been thinking hard about the kinds of perks that can we give to you in return of your donation. What came first to mind was giving you tons of merchandise. However, those will not help you to grow your business, and it will cost you more for shipping and handling.

So we try to give you more valuable things in return...

We will give you what we have done for the last 5 years. We have been teaching people how to sell their products on the Internet, and today, we want you to have our training module as our perk to you.

We give you perks with technical knowledge to make your network marketing visible on the internet. Starting with simple stuff such as : resizing your product images, editing video, hosting a webinar, building your own website, etc. 

If you need something more advanced than that, we have marketing tutorials : how to advertise your product on Google Adwords and Facebook so that you can be reached by people around the world without leaving your home. Plus, if you want to automate the follow-up process on the internet, you will enjoy our 'REMARKETING' training module. 

'REMARKETING' technique will help you bring your prospects back to your website. We will give you detailed screenshots on how to do it correctly.

All the tutorials are in PDF format and MP4 (video), which is DRM free (downloadable). This means you can read it on your iPad, smartphone, laptop or any other devices that can read PDF files and MP4 videos. And you can have it starting from a $15 donation.

CLICK HERE to donate 'Make This Happen' perk for $5

CLICK HERE to donate 'Web Creation Tutorials' perk for $15

CLICK HERE to donate 'Web & Technical Tutorials' perk for $30

CLICK HERE to donate 'Online Marketing Basic' perk for $50

CLICK HERE to donate 'Online Marketing Basic' perk for $75

CLICK HERE to donate 'Make This Happen' perk for $5

CLICK HERE to donate 'Web Creation Tutorials' perk for $15
(all perks above are included)


CLICK HERE to donate 'Web & Technical Tutorials' perk for $30
(all perks above are included)


CLICK HERE to donate 'Online Marketing Basic' perk for $50
(all perks above are included)


CLICK HERE to donate 'Online Marketing Basic' perk for $75
(all perks above are included)

Plus, we have valuable perks for those who need personal assistance with this technical stuff in 30 days or even 60 days after this campaign ends. You can ask any technical questions you have based on the tutorial and we will answer your email in less than 24 hours. This valuable support is for those who pledge donations of $150 or more.

CLICK HERE to donate '30 Days Online Assistant' perk for $150
('Online Marketing Advance' perk is included)

CLICK HERE to donate '60 Days Online Assistant' perk for $200
('Online Marketing Advance' perk is included)

Last but not least, if you're a BIG thinker or TOP leader, please support us as contributor or sponsor. Your photo, company logo or brand will be seen by millions of people who search the Sociyo app on Apple App Store or Google Play Store. 

We will put your photo as a screenshot there. And for company logo or brand, we will put it inside the app itself as Official Sponsor.

CLICK HERE to become 'SILVER Contributor' for $325 DONATION
CLICK HERE to become 'GOLD Contributor' for $400 DONATION
CLICK HERE to become 'PLATINUM Contributor' for $500 DONATION
CLICK HERE to become 'DIAMOND Contributor' for $1,000 DONATION

CLICK HERE to become 'OFFICIAL SPONSOR' for $5,000 DONATION 



Q: Is this for Android or Apple device?
A: Both. Sociyo requires Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean) or later, iPod Touch or iPhone with iOS 7 or later.

Q: Will it be free?
A: Yes. We will release this app on Google Play and Apple Store for FREE; without ads and without Lite or Pro version. It will be absolutely FREE for you.

Q: When is the expected release date?
A: We already marked our calendar on June, 2014 for BETA version. Although the initial release may be for one platform, we will try to bring both versions on the same day. 

BETA version means we will give you a link to install and test the app on your device before it becomes officially available on the App Store or Google Play Store. If everything works perfectly within next 30 days after BETA launch, we will submit it to the stores then all of your networks can download it for FREE, as promised.

Q: Is Sociyo an MLM company?
A: No, we are not. We are a group of people who can't let more people fail in network marketing business. We have seen our friends and family fail and return to their daily jobs, tear their dream books and try to accept the bitter pill. We just want to support people like them by giving great apps to run network marketing with a better chance of success.

Q: Can I contact you if I have great idea to share?
A: Sure, why not! Check our 'contact us' below.

We live in and will work on this project from Serpong, Tangerang Selatan, Indonesia. Our time zone is GMT +7. You can reach us by email and we promise to reply your email within 24 hours, even on Saturdays and Sundays or public holidays during this Indiegogo campaign. We welcome any thoughts and ideas from you. Your positive energy means a lot to us.

We only have 49 days to run this campaign in Indiegogo. Only 49 days to make this dream come true. If you believe this will benefit your life and your network marketing business, please support us. Spread the word on your Facebook, Twitter, Google+, or any other social media about this campaign. Tell them why this project is so important to all of us.

We believe that there are a lot of people out there who are willing to support us to make this project happen. But we have limited resources to reach them. If you give your hand to help us reach them, 49 days is more than enough. So, let's do this... TOGETHER!

story:
ENGLISH

--------------------------------------------------------------

"Colonial Tercios and Bixos are fighting in a lost colony of BI-XO quadrant. Would you help them? ... Any of them will be fine"

Bi-Xo Wars is about using honkers and stupid sense or humour for doing some sci-fi fun.

This is a little crowdfunding. The idea is to produce an amount of 28 mm resin honker miniatures that will be only available during this Indiegogo campaign. They won't be available in stores, as the idea is to share some luv, not to create an imperium.

WHAT WE NEED?

Money for producing the miniatures ;] All money will be used for producing perks. And if we get enough of those green papers, we'll do some special miniatures ( as space colonist or Bixo eggs ) as rewards, and continue with next steps in this weird project.

A Plan

The first step is to do a pack of 10 different models of Colonial Tercios and 10 different models of Bixos.

B Plan

If we reach the goal, and people keep interested, our next step will be place a new goal and to do a pack of 5 more different models of Colonial Tercios with special weapons and 2 Characters, and 5 more different models of mutant Bixos and "Known" Bixos.

C Plan

If we reach that goal, our next step will be place a new goal and to do rules and maps for playing with all those miniatures. Of course, with your help.

D Plan

If we reach that goal, our final step will be place a new goal and to do rules for playing with centimetres and a pair of big special miniatures.

BI-XO... WHAT?

People out there ( in Spain, most of them ) remember those honker miniatures in the 90s. There is no way to get them now, but maybe these, altough different, could fit that little hole in their hearts ( and glass cabinets ).

Bi-xo Wars is about opening doors, shoot, run and scream when one of your infected partners become a Bixo near to you. If you have seen Alien, you got it. That's all. Isn't enough?

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If crowdfunding sucess, we'll create new perks, some of them with rules, so if you have a weird idea to do them, that could be a good way to help.

PERKS CONTENT

Perk A includes:

- Tercio's Sargeant with hand weapon and pistol

- Tercio with submachine gun

- Tercio with machine gun

- Tercio with shotgun

- Tercio with flamethrower

Or:

- 5 different models of Bixos

Perk B includes:

- The same as perk A, but with 2 different models of each Tercio or Bixo ( doing a total of 10 miniatures ) AND Armortreto with claw and cannon or Mama

Perk C includes:

- The same as perk B, but including Tercios AND Bixos in same perk ( doing a total of 22 miniatures ). In addition, this perk includes a Yaya Hunter ( alien mercenary for Colonial Tercios ) and an Albino Gynecologist ( an alien doctor, for Bixos ).

El Perk D includes:

- Sargent of the Tercio with shield and pistol

- Tercio with chainsaw

- Tercio with cannon

- Tercio with experimental weapon

- Tercio with heavy machine gun

- Markus Lundren, hero of the Colonial Tercios

- Arms for Armortreto with chainsaw, experimental weapon and heavy machinegun

Or

- Mutant Bixo with 4 arms

- Mutant Bixo with wings

- Mutant Bixo with cangaroo tail

- Spitting mutant Bixo

- Mutant Bixo with whipping tongue

- Yaya-Bixo, super mutant of the Buxos horde

- Mama pieces for 2 extra arms, spitting and whipping tongue

Perk E  includes:

- Same as perk D plus perk B

Perk F  includes:

- Sames as perk D, but with Colonial Tercios and Bixos in same perk + perk C

Perk G includes:

- Same as perk F, but with 2 models of every Tercio with special weapon and every mutant Bixo

AVAILABLE MINIATURES:

You can add any of these miniatures to your perks, or simply make an "order" for them:

- Rulebook + Maps of interior in PDF (4) - 5 €

- Rulebook + Maps of interior printed (4)+ Maps of outdoor (2) - 8 €

- Maps of interior in wood (4) = 54,00 €

- N x Pieces of wall in wood = N x 0,50 €

- N x Doors = N x 0,50 €

COLONIAL TERCIOS:

- Sargent of the Tercio with hand weapon and pistol (1 model) - 2 €

- Sargent of the Tercio with shield and pistol (1 model) - 2 €

- Tercios with submachine gun (2 models) - 4 €

BIXOS:

- Bixos (10 models) - 20 € (2 € each)

- Mutant Bixos with 4 arms (2 models) - 4 €

- Mutant Bixos with wings (2 models) - 4 €

- Mutant Bixos with cangaroo tail (2 models) - 4 €

- Mama (1 model) - 5 €

- Mama pieces for 2 extra arms, spitting and whipping tongue (4 pieces) - 4 €

- Lazybone (1 model) - 3 €

- Wormx (1 model) - 3 €

ESPAÑOL

--------------------------------------------------------------

"Tercios Coloniales y Bixos luchan en una colonia olvidada del cuadrante BI-XO. ¿Les ayudarás? ... A cualquiera, eso es lo de menos"

Bi-Xo Wars va de usar narizones y un estúpido sentido del humor para crear un poco de diversión en ciencia ficción.

Esta es una pequeña campaña de mecenazgo. La idea es producir un montón de miniaturas de narizones de resina de 28 mm. que estarán disponibles sólo para esta campaña de Indiegogo. No estarán disponibles en tiendas, ya que la idea es repartir hamor, no crear un imperio.

QUÉ NECESITAMOS?

Dinero para producir las miniaturas ;] Todo el dinero se usará para producir los perks. Y si conseguimos bastantes de esos papelajos verdes, haremos algunas miniaturas especiales ( como colonos espaciales o huevos de Bixo ) como recompensas, y continuaremos con los siguientes pasos de este proyecto de locos.

Plan A

El primer paso es hacer un pack de 10 modelos diferentes de Tercios Coloniales y otros 10 modelos diferentes de Bixos.

Plan B

Si llegamos hasta el primer goal, y la gente sigue interesada, el siguiente paso será establecer un nuevo goal y hacer un pack de 5 nuevos modelos de Tercios Coloniales con armas especiales y 2 Personajes, y 5 nuevos modelos de Bixos mutantes y Bixos "Conocidos".

Plan C

Si conseguimos ese nuevo goal, el siguiente paso será establecer un nuevo goal y hacer reglas y mapas para jugar con todas esas miniaturas. Por supuesto, con vuestra ayuda.

Plan D

Si conseguimos ese nuevo goal, el siguiente paso será establecer un nuevo goal y hacer reglas para jgar con centímetros y un par de miniaturas especiales grandes.

BI-XO... QUÉ?

La gente ( en España, la mayoría de ellos ) recuerda aquellas miniaturas de narizones de los 90s. No hay forma de conseguirlas hoy día, pero puede que estas otras, aunque no iguales, cierren esa heridas en sus corazoncitos ( y vitrinas ).

Bi-xo Wars trata sobre abrir puertas, disparar, correr y gritar cuando uno de tus compañeros infectados se convierte en Bixo a tu lado. Si has visto Alien, ya sabes de qué va. Eso es todo. ¿No es suficiente?

OTRAS FORMAS DE AYUDAR

Si la campaña de mecenazgo tiene éxito, crearemos nuevos perks, algunos de ellos con reglas, así que si tienes una idea loca para ellas, esa podría ser una buena forma de ayudar.

CONTENIDO DE LOS PERKS

El Perk A incluye:

- Sargento del Tercio con arma de mano y pistola

- Tercio con subfusil

- Tercio con fusil

- Tercio con escopeta

- Tercio con lanzallamas

O:

- 5 modelos diferentes de Bixo

El Perk B incluye:

- Lo mismo que el perk A, pero con 2 modelos diferentes de cada Tercio o Bixo ( haciendo un total de 10 miniaturas ) Y un Armortreto con garra y cañón o una Mama

El Perk C incluye:

- Los mismo que el perk B, pero con los Tercios Y los Bixos en el mismo perk ( haciendo un total de 22 miniaturas ). Además, este perk incluye un Cazador Yaya ( mercenario alienígena para los Tercios Coloniales ) y un Ginecólogo Albino ( un médico alienígena, para los Bixos ).

El Perk D incluye:

- Sargento del Tercio con ecudo y pistola

- Tercio con motosierra

- Tercio con cañón

- Tercio con arma experimental

- Tercio con ametralladora

- Markus Lundren, héroe del Tercio Colonial

- Brazos de Armortreto con Motosierra, Arma Experimental y Ametralladora

O

- Bixo Mutante con alas

- Bixo Mutante con cola de canguro

- Bixo Mutante escupidor

- Bixo Mutante con lengua látigo

- Yaya-Bixo, super mutante de la horda de Bixos

- Piezas de Mama para 2 brazos extra, escupir y lengua látigo

El Perk E incluye:

- Lo mismo que el perk D más el perk B

El Perk F incluye:

- Lo mismo que el perk D, pero con Tercios Coloniales y Bixos en el mismo perk + el perk C

El Perk G incluye:

- Lo mismo que el perk F, pero con dos modelos de cada Tercio con arma especial, y cada Bixo Mutante

MINIATURAS DISPONIBLES:

Puedes añadir cualqueira de estas miniaturas a tu perk, o simplemente hacer un "pedido" por ellas:

story_txt:
ENGLISH
--------------------------------------------------------------
"Colonial Tercios and Bixos are fighting in a lost colony of BI-XO quadrant. Would you help them? ... Any of them will be fine"
Bi-Xo Wars is about using honkers and stupid sense or humour for doing some sci-fi fun.
This is a little crowdfunding. The idea is to produce an amount of 28 mm resin honker miniatures that will be only available during this Indiegogo campaign. They won't be available in stores, as the idea is to share some luv, not to create an imperium.WHAT WE NEED?
Money for producing the miniatures ;] All money will be used for producing perks. And if we get enough of those green papers, we'll do some special miniatures ( as space colonist or Bixo eggs ) as rewards, and continue with next steps in this weird project.
A Plan
The first step is to do a pack of 10 different models of Colonial Tercios and 10 different models of Bixos.
B Plan
If we reach the goal, and people keep interested, our next step will be place a new goal and to do a pack of 5 more different models of Colonial Tercios with special weapons and 2 Characters, and 5 more different models of mutant Bixos and "Known" Bixos.
C Plan
If we reach that goal, our next step will be place a new goal and to do rules and maps for playing with all those miniatures. Of course, with your help.
D Plan
If we reach that goal, our final step will be place a new goal and to do rules for playing with centimetres and a pair of big special miniatures.BI-XO... WHAT?
People out there ( in Spain, most of them ) remember those honker miniatures in the 90s. There is no way to get them now, but maybe these, altough different, could fit that little hole in their hearts ( and glass cabinets ).
Bi-xo Wars is about opening doors, shoot, run and scream when one of your infected partners become a Bixo near to you. If you have seen Alien, you got it. That's all. Isn't enough?


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
If crowdfunding sucess, we'll create new perks, some of them with rules, so if you have a weird idea to do them, that could be a good way to help.PERKS CONTENT
Perk A includes:
- Tercio's Sargeant with hand weapon and pistol
- Tercio with submachine gun
- Tercio with machine gun
- Tercio with shotgun
- Tercio with flamethrower
Or:
- 5 different models of Bixos
Perk B includes:
- The same as perk A, but with 2 different models of each Tercio or Bixo ( doing a total of 10 miniatures ) AND Armortreto with claw and cannon or Mama
Perk C includes:
- The same as perk B, but including Tercios AND Bixos in same perk ( doing a total of 22 miniatures ). In addition, this perk includes a Yaya Hunter ( alien mercenary for Colonial Tercios ) and an Albino Gynecologist ( an alien doctor, for Bixos ).
El Perk D includes:
- Sargent of the Tercio with shield and pistol
- Tercio with chainsaw
- Tercio with cannon
- Tercio with experimental weapon
- Tercio with heavy machine gun
- Markus Lundren, hero of the Colonial Tercios
- Arms for Armortreto with chainsaw, experimental weapon and heavy machinegun
Or
- Mutant Bixo with 4 arms
- Mutant Bixo with wings
- Mutant Bixo with cangaroo tail
- Spitting mutant Bixo
- Mutant Bixo with whipping tongue
- Yaya-Bixo, super mutant of the Buxos horde
- Mama pieces for 2 extra arms, spitting and whipping tongue
Perk E  includes:
- Same as perk D plus perk B
Perk F  includes:
- Sames as perk D, but with Colonial Tercios and Bixos in same perk + perk C
Perk G includes:
- Same as perk F, but with 2 models of every Tercio with special weapon and every mutant Bixo
AVAILABLE MINIATURES:

story:
I/O - Input/Output 

Earth - The near future


The world is in chaos! Global warming has escalated and a new Ice Age is imminent.
Governments has dissolved in favor of Mega Corporations, capitalsim reigns the world, and most of the world's population live their lives in Cyberspace to escape the harsh reality of real life.

Enter the hackers!
They live for hacking the hypersecure systems put up by the numerous corporations around the world. Some do it to for a living for Corps, others to "liberate" information from the Corps, but they all do it for, what they call, the ultimate thrill and of course to add credits to their bank accounts.

Take the role as a hacker, hacking your way up in the world, taking down Corps, filling your bank account so you can upgrade to the latest in Cyberdecks!

----------------

I/O is heavily inspired by games like Space Invaders and Arkanoid. You will hack systems interactively, flinging code crackers and dataminers into the systems. All the while dodging and breaking ICE, walls and other nasty defense systems.

The Impact

The world is getting tired of Fantasy games! We need to make more Science Fiction games, and especially more Cyberpunk!

Out ultimate goal is to become one of the worlds leading Cyberpunk game development studio and YOU can help us become that! Without your support, we won't be able to cut down on our day job to focus on our game development.


So help us realize every Cyberpunkers dream! Get more Cyberpunk games out on the market by supporting the development of I/O.


Our Story

I attended GDC 2007 in San Fransisco and on the plane home I talked to a friend of mine about why there were so few Cyberpunk games in the world.

When I got home I couldn't let go of the thought so I decided to start my own Indie Game Development Studio.

January 2008 I registered Kybernesis and started looking for funding.


It didn't go too well... Norway focuses primarily on edutainment games and serious gaming for the oil business, so my dream of making entertainment games set in a Post Apocalyptic, Cyberpunk world just didn't mesh with Norwegian investors.


I, Ronny, and my assistant, Ståle are now working on simple hacker games to distribute on casual games platforms and Android.

What You Get

Check out our VIP rewards! Based on the amount contributed you will get Beta access, T-shirts, Buttons and even in-game characters named after you!


And of course! You will get to help us develop future projects based in the same cyberpunk setting!


Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word!!

Point people to our website: www.kybernesis.com and Facebook page!

And request IndieGoGo to feature our project with this link: Feature this!


Concept graphics


Concept graphics of the player and two ICE enemies.

Point people to our website: www.kybernesis.com and Facebook page!
And request IndieGoGo to feature our project with this link: Feature this!

 player and two ICE enemies.

story:
THE PROJECT

Some information you will find useful:

WHO AM I - 

          

  • Hi there, my name is Kwame Nkrumah-Acheampong [a.k.a. The Snowleopard], as I have been told I am a bit of an endangered species when it comes to skiers you see on slopes, and especially at an Olympics. I am Ghana's first winter Olympian and just in case you are wondering where Ghana is, its a little country on the coast of West Africa, bordering the Atlantic ocean known for its Black Stars football team, cocoa and gold. I am professionally a tourism management professional having worked at Snozone Milton Keynes [an indoor ski centre in UK, and also Planet Ice Milton Keynes [an ice rink]. I have held managerial positions in a number of establishments. I am the holder of 2 degrees in Tourism Management including a masters degree from Westminster University, London.
  • Well enough of Kwame the professional and more of The Snowleopard. I got into skiing whilst working at the ski slope and due to a comment made that I could not become a good skier, I decided to take things one step further by attempting to qualify for an Olympics in record time. I missed out on the Turin Olympics by about 87 points. My failure hit me real hard, especially after battling through a lot of negative comments about the impossibility of going from none skier to top level skier in a matter of 2 years. However I did not give up and managed to make qualification for the 2010 Olympics. I think its a testament to my never give up attitude and willingness to give things a committed try.

 

WHY A SKI SLOPE -

          One of the concept drawings for the ski slope project in Mamfe

          

 

  • I want to keep the flame I kindled in lots of people and youngsters not only in Ghana but around Africa burning, by building on what I was able to achieve through the Olympics and bringing snow to West Africa. I  especially want to further develop the Ghana ski team and having such a facility will give our team a fighting chance to grow .

 

THE IMPOSSIBLE - 

                                              My Olympic Slalom run

         

 

  • I was told I could never make it to the Olympics, and a gentleman who has now become my friend and most avid supporter made a statement that 'he would eat his hat if I ever qualified to ski in an Olympics', he had to use a lot of ketchup for that hat. I am a firm believer that the African physiology is suited to skiing which is a power sport and with the right facility we could add some 'chocolate colour to an all too milky sport'

 

WHAT WE NEED -  

SKI SLOPE BUDGET:

 Your funding will enable the ski slope project materialise with:

  • £50,000 for a second-hand puma lift
  • £305,000 for structure to house ski slope [ground works and building]
  • £25,000 for volunteer accommodation 
  • £100,000-£150,000 on a second-hand chiller and piping unit for keeping the slope floor cold
  • £40,000 Dehumidifier unit
  • £20,000 Air-conditioning and electrics
  • £20,000 for construction salaries and volunteers 

 

WHAT HAPPENS IF WE DONT ACHIEVE THE FUNDING TARGET

Never the
one to give up I will keep pushing on with the project, with the development of
either a grass ski slope or artificial plastic ski slope. Already I have through friends/family and personal resources, I have:
 

  1. Bought the land area needed
  2. Constructed an access road
  3. Began clearing the area for the slope development
  4. Bought most of the machinery etc. needed for construction to reduce future costs

So whatever you contribute will definitely be used to further the stage of development the project is at. 

 

BEING PART OF THE DREAM

Apart from knowing and telling everyone that you were part of a unique
project such as this, you also:

  • get to tell your friends you are off for a ski holiday in Ghana, West Africa!!!! Now imagine their faces!!!!!
  • get the opportunity to volunteer and be part of a unique project build
  • for those who are looking for an educational opportunity or want to try their hands at green construction, here is a special opportunity
  • impact the local people through the innovative concepts and skill training they will get from being employed on the build
  • the project once completed as part of its corporate social responsibility will look to enhance the lives of the local Mamfe community by contributing to local schools, health services and also providing free ski tuition to all youngsters below 16 from the local community
  • and finally you help place an African skier/s at an Olympics. I know how I felt at the opening ceremony of the Vancouver Olympics 'a priceless feeling of achievement'

DONT FORGET YOU ALSO GET SOME OF THE UNIQUE PERKS ASSOCIATED WITH THIS CAMPAIGN - check out the perks i.e. from visits to Ghana to see the project in action, to limited Ghana Ski Team stuff.

      PROJECT IMPACT

      WHAT YOU COULD HELP CREATE:

      • YOUR CONTRIBUTION - It's not everyday that one gets the chance to say I helped build that historic monument. Such projects have always been undertaken by BIG money firms spending millions. I am trying to create something unique with what might be said to be a tiny budget. The project will not only bring work to local people, give youngsters another avenue to engage in sports apart from football, boxing and athletics to some degree.

       

      • PLACING YOUR TRUST IN ME - I am pretty aware that the question of 'can this chap really build a ski slope' must be rattling around somewhere in your brain. Against all odds and a mountain of obstacles, I made it to the Olympics. I qualified through months of hard work on and off the slope. I campaigned and got sponsorship from companies mostly in the form of equipment and I can say the biggest support when it finally came to the actual Olympics was from my family and fans. I think the Winter Olympics is a pretty big deal and getting there off the back of some real hard work makes it even a bigger deal. On the professional front I have managed projects in Europe and more essentially I have had some good experience with projects in Ghana.

       

      • IS YOUR CONTRIBUTION GOING TO BE  USED WISELY? - it has become more and more difficult to trust people will do what they say they will do. I promised my fans that those who helped me fund my ski suit [costly bit of stretch fabric] would have their names printed on the ski suit, and I made it happen. I virtually was on the Olympic slope with more than 20 fans who had their names on my suit. I am a firm believer in not asking for help until you have shown you have something to loose if you mess up. I have already purchased the land [includes a naturally occurring spring which leads into a beautiful waterfall], earth moving machinery and other equipment we are going to need to build.

       

      OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

      DON'T HAVE CASH BUT WANT TO CONTRIBUTE?:

      • Like my Olympics, there are so many ways you can help this project become a reality. There are lots of things we are going to need that if we can get, will save us money buying [who knows there could be someone out there with a ski lift blocking his or her driveway and happy to give it away for a useful cause - hope its you reading!!!!]. So we are looking for both used and new ski equipment i.e. helmets, skis, snowboard, toboggans, ski poles, goggles, jackets and ski pants for our budding skiers when the slope is built. 
      • Volunteers with building skills, lifting skills and an ability to raise some funding to come lend a hand are also welcome. Once the ski slope is built we would be looking for volunteer coaches and trainers to come help out with teaching youngsters how to ski/snowboard.
      • I am also looking for any form of support be it I.T related, fund raising, training camps, accommodation and more for the development of the ski team and slope. So don't through away that old laptop or desk and if you can spare some time to assist us remotely please get in touch .
      • Please don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tool!, and spread the word on twitter, facebook and where ever you can spread the news.

       

                          SO JOIN ME AND LETS MAKE HISTORY

                   

      I and Ted Ligety of the USA ski team in Ghana to teach kids how to ski on grass skis

story:
For years Amanda and I have felt a tug at our hearts to serve in a greater capacity and abroad. In 2014 Amanda and I will put our fears aside, sacrifice vacation time, and travel to Haiti with our local church, Grace Point Church, and alongside a larger group known as Nehemiah Vision Ministries. Our agenda in Haiti could consist of the construction of new and needed buildings, attending to medical / dental needs, hosting a vacation bible school, and other outreach programs. Amanda and I are taking this opportunity to put our faith at work and cannot wait to see how God will transform us as we prepare for our trip, once we are on our way, and as we return.

As you might imagine the cost of flight, room and board, as well as, everything we might need for the trip is not cheap; times two. Although every effort is made to drive down the cost of these trips we still find ourselves in need of additional support to make this endeavor a possibility.

The total cost for our trip will be $3,800 or $1,900 / each. We hope that you will consider giving in prayer or finances. Our trip is schedule for June 28 – July 5. Below is a breakdown of when we are asked to have the remainder of our funds provided:

 $400 Deposit (Due February 16, 2014) - Completed

 $2,000 Airline Fare (Due May 9, 2014)

 $1,400 Remainder (Due June 8, 2014)

We know what you might be thinking – that’s a lot of money and I only have $5. Well, $5 means a lot to us so whether you have $5 or $500 we would welcome your donation just the same. As we mentioned earlier there are other ways to support Amanda and I on this trip, below are a few of those ways:

 Pray that God will prepare our hearts and help us to abide in Him.

 Pray that God would open the hearts of those in Haiti.

 Pray also that God would provide financial support for our team, Amanda, and me as we prepare to go.

If either or both of us are unable to raise enough funds or to go due to unforeseen circumstances, the monies I raise will be sent to Haiti to support the mission work of the team.

Amanda and Brian Stevenson.

Lastly, Amanda and I want to personally thank you in advance for what God would have you do to provide and support us on this life changing journey.

If you would like to learn more about Grace Point Church you can visit their website at www.gracepoint.org

If you would like to learn more about Nehemiah Vision Ministries you can visit their website at www.nehemiahvisionministries.org

Yours in Christ,

Brian and Amanda Stevenson

How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can they preach unless they are sent? As it is written, "How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news! Romans 10:14-15

story:
Zombie Enthusiasts and Survivors!

My name is Jchon Bahl II (pronounced "Shawn Ball"), I am owner of Mystery Suit Games and I'm preparing to release my first card game, Dead Apocalypse. One thing to know about me is that I've always been unnaturally passionate about board/card games, so much that I decided to get off my butt and make one of my own game concepts a reality!

This campaign is to help us raise funds to pay for the upfront manufacturing costs for the game so that we can take the proof of concept (prototype) to GenCon 14' and other game conventions this summer to gain exposure. Provided are a variety of perks you'll receive for your generosity.


Zombie and Human Perks!

We're setting out to raise $6000 to fund the preliminary manufacturing costs required for printing to begin. I especially want to meet this goal so that I can have a proof of concept in time for GenCon which is August 14-17 in Indianapolis, Indiana. I'm planning to hold events in which people can sign up to play the game! It'd be the perfect first exposure to introduce Dead Apocalypse to the world.



Manufacturing Costs

Originally I had Delano Services quote for 275 cards. 1000 copies was quoted at $18,070.50 and 1500 copies was quoted at $20,828.20. This includes the cost for the box packaging, the rulebook, all 275 cards, a platform in the box to organize the cards and shrink wrap.

Now there are only 242 cards per game, which should knock down the price significantly. I'm roughly estimating about $16,000 for 1000 copies.

Half of that is due upfront  (about $8000) and the rest after printing is finished. Your proceeds will contribute to this preliminary upfront cost. The remainder will come directly out of my pocket as it should since I'm publishing the game myself. But don't think for once that your contributions go unnoticed.



Rewards

Due to your selflessness and generosity, we offer spectacular rewards! Rewards include:

  • Recognition and High Praise on our website and rulebook!!
  • Digital Wallpaper
  • Digital Artbook
  • Complete Full Color Print and Play
  • One of a kind Dead Apocalypse T-Shirt
  • The Dead Apocalypse game with promos upon release
  • Your name in the game!
  • Your face in the game!

(Any image and name submitted must not be a copyrighted work, and is subject for approval to ensure we protect our image)

For "The In-Game Experience" perk, choose one of these Human cards and give us the name you would like the card changed to!


For "The Living Dead Guy" perk, choose one of these Zombie cards and give us the name you would like the card changed to!


The Impact

Dead Apocalypse is one of the first fully cooperative deckbuilding games of strategic survival, set during a present day zombie apocalypse. Staying alive is your only goal in this game, and you must work with your allies to search for human survivors, abandoned locations, and lifesaving equipment to fend off the zombie horde.  Teamwork is the key to victory, for if you can't trust your fellow players none of you will reach the CDC... alive!

Dead Apocalypse is a fully cooperative deckbuilding game, meaning all players strive for the same goal and either win together or lose together. Dead Apocalypse is  1-4 players so if there isn't someone in your company you still have the opportunity to try to fight for survival all alone. Don't fret though because there are other game variants for those seeking an easier game or a more competitive game.

With the help from my amazing artist, Joel Wittlif, and the support of many friends and family who helped cut lots of paper and playtest, we've been able to accomplish all the game design, the rulebook, all 87 card illustrations, all card design and the packaging design! The next milestone is manufacturing. Since I'm keeping the project local and not outsourcing any work, there happens to be a well renowned and professionally experienced game manufacturer right here in Battle Creek, Michigan where I'm located! Delano Services has been an industry leader in printing many popular games now including Fluxx and Killer Bunnies. Nothing would be greater than to see Dead Apocalypse printed alongside such great games!

Currently I can account for about a 3rd of the manufacturing costs, all hard earned cash at my day job that I'm personally investing in this project. I need help jumping this last hurdle, but I'm not going to ask for you to account for the remainder of my costs. Instead, I'm going to ask that you help me get just what I need to have the manufacturer print the project. This happens to be half the actual cost - they require half up front and the other half once finished printing. This will significantly help me on my conquest to put a game on the market and make something of myself. We've all worked hard to try to achieve our goals and aspirations, that goes without even being said. So this is my dream and goal, to have something tangible to show for all the hard work and time I've invested in games. I've been creating games since I was a boy and always had the same ambition, that someone might one day recognize me and connect me with the game I've created, because the game meant something to him or her.


Other Ways You Can Help

Want to help but don't have the spare change? Here's what you can do.

  1. Recommend us to your friends and family!
  2. Follow us on Facebook and at mysterysuitgames.com
  3. Download our FREE condensed Print and Play and play with a friend


FAQs

1) I just made my contribution on a perk with more than one options. How will Mystery Suit Games know which selection I make?

Once our funding goal is met and our campaign is finished, we will contact you via email to verify your postal address and which items you have pre-ordered.

2) I want to receive a different quantity of games or a combination of rewards that do not exist in the available perks. What should I do?

You can email jchon@mysterysuitgames.com and request a quote for the items you want. We'll then let you know the appropriate perk to choose and you can adjust the difference in the "how much would you like to contribute" field.

3) When can I expect to receive my rewards?

The plan is to start production as soon as we're assured the funds are in order which will take about 6 weeks for manufacturing. As soon as those puppies are ready, I'll have a truck ready to begin the packaging for shipping. Everyone should have their rewards by August.

4) What if the Goal is not met?

Even if our goal is not met, we have devised a plan to accommodate every contributor using alternate means for production, that way no one will be disappointed. If you don't believe me, check out these guys in Wisconsin who have already printed a legitimate prototype of the game.

 a game on the market and make something of myself. We've all worked 
hard to try to achieve our goals and aspirations, that goes without even
 being said. So this is my dream and goal, to have something tangible to
 show for all the hard work and time I've invested in games. I've been 
creating games since I was a boy and always had the same ambition, that 
someone might one day recognize me and connect me with the game I've 
created, because the game meant something to him or her.Other Ways You Can HelpWant to help but don't have the spare change? Here's what you can do.
Recommend us to your friends and family!
Follow us on Facebook and at mysterysuitgames.com
Download our FREE condensed Print and Play and play with a friend
FAQs1) I just made my contribution on a perk with more than one options. How will Mystery Suit Games know which selection I make?
Once our funding goal is met and our campaign is finished, we will contact you via email to verify your postal address and which items you have pre-ordered.2) I want to receive a different quantity of games or a combination of rewards that do not exist in the available perks. What should I do?
You can email jchon@mysterysuitgames.com and request a quote for the items you want. We'll then let you know the appropriate perk to choose and you can adjust the difference in the "how much would you like to contribute" field.
3) When can I expect to receive my rewards?
The plan is to start production as soon as we're assured the funds are in order which will take about 6 weeks for manufacturing. As soon as those puppies are ready, I'll have a truck ready to begin the packaging for shipping. Everyone should have their rewards by August.4) What if the Goal is not met?Even if our goal is not met, we have devised a plan to accommodate 
every contributor using alternate means for production, that way no one 
will be disappointed. If you don't believe me, check out these guys in Wisconsin who have already printed a legitimate prototype of the game.

story:
Welcome to the Planet Slammers facelift funding campaign!

 

Planet Slammers is an Android game in which you have to use your planet like a battering ram to knock other planets into the deadly nebula. Anyone that has played “Tin Pin Slammers” from “The world ends with you” Nintendo DS game will immediately see where I got the idea.

To help you win there are a few special abilities: Fire makes you faster, Wind hides your planet, Ice shields you. And there are 3 game modes: missions with different objectives, multiplayer and endless.

You can checkout Planet Slammers here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.abismo.planetslammers





So, if the game has been published, why this funding campaign? The game may be functional but there is a lot that can be improved to help the game become a success.
I have asked the opinion of a few professionals in mobile gaming and there were praises but also a consensus that the game can be made better. They gave me lots of suggestions but most of them came down to:

  1. Hire a professional 2D artist to improve the graphics - this one was unanimous. Current graphics are OK at best.



  1. Add sound effects and music
  2. Make new missions
  3. Create more planets and a new abilities



I have lots of ideas on how to make it look better, sound better and behave better but I need someone with the right skills to help me. I wasted too much time trying to figure out how to do the things I don’t know and it never get as good as what I had in mind. Like these nebula that were made following tutorials:


New missions, planets and abilities are on the way, but it’s a slow process. These planets are not yet in that game only because there was no time to put them:



I need to hire people and that costs money that I don’t have right now. So here’s what I plan to do if this funding campaign works:

  1. Hire a 2D graphic artist to
    1. Remake buttons and screens
    2. Create animated special effects for collisions, movement and special abilities
    3. Draw better looking planets and more planets
    4. Remake icons, screenshots, feature image and other graphics
  2. Hire a sound artist to make
    1. New music for the game and menus
    2. Game special effects
    3. Menu sounds
  3. Hire someone to help me make a better trailer.
  4. Hire a programmer to code
    1. The improvements listed above
    2. New missions
    3. New abilities
    4. New planets and planet selection on Multiplayer and Endless modes
    5. Planet market for new planets


If the goal is not met I will prioritize the changes above with a cost / benefit approach starting with the game art. But I’m  really cheering for everything.



I already consulted a game artist a a sound engineer and a programmer to get the cost for this project. I have worked with them before making games for Best Cool and Fun Games. One of them is Pet Dash. Unfortunately the company close it’s games division and the other games were not published.



You can check out the artists here:

Game art by Lumi Mae : www.lumimae.com
Music and sounds by Rodolfo Santana : http://soundcloud.com/rodolfo-santana



My name is Giuliano Caliari, a Software Engineer from Brazil. Most of my career I have been working in internet Portals like iG and R7 but in the last couple of years the mobile boom gave me the opportunity to work with games. I went to work at Best Cool and Fun Games and helped build a few games and even created one of my own: Pet Dash.
Planet Slammers is an Android Game that I made in my spare time to learn how to make games. My wife helped me with menus graphics and a friend (Rodolfo Santana) donated the music but all the rest was done by me in my spare time over the last year.



With your help this game can be one of the best in Google Play (and in the future, the Apple App Store). I really believe Planet Slammers can be a great game. If you want to share this dream and help it come true, don’t hesitate to help.




All the perks will be implemented for the next version of the game. As with the game, they will be released as they get done.

story:
Sanam Has got a mention on IGN-ME Today! have a look at the Article here


Update #1, Some work in progress for Sanam’s 1st Game-Play Preview

Hello Guys
As I promised we are working on a preview for Sanam’s game-play, and here are some of the things that you are going to see in the video content:

#Torrac Updated and Textured and shown how it is going to look like inside the Game-EngineWIP
#Scene Elements Textured WIP
#Fijleh Combo Animation #1 WIP

Update #1 Video


Update #2, Jan 26 :

Sanam is currently on Steam GreeLight you can Rate it here
The Game will support Arabic Language and English Language.


Sanam is a side scrolling platform action adventure game, developed independently by ‘Team Food Fighter’; a group of 4 people trying to fulfill their dreams.

The gameplay is inspired by our childhood’s favorite games like Prince of Persia, Viewtiful Joe, Zelda and many newly released games too. Full of urban myths and treasures just like some of the old school "Retro Games".

We started working on Sanam in August 2012, we planned to deliver an alpha downloadable level with the basic game play and later put the project on Indiegogo. Sadly, the funds we had weren't enough, so we delivered a trailer for the story of the game to showcase what we currently have for the alpha level in the video above.

The current content (alpha level and the 4 characters) is not the final representation of the game or the soon to come content. The game will contain 5 unique chapters and each will contain 5 levels with a boss fight.

We aim for Sanam to be a fully released game so we seek your help; the Indigogo community, to get enough funds to finish this dream of ours.

Sanam literally means Idol in Arabic.

We chose the name Sanam because its all about the idols "The fallen Gods" and their rise to power. 

The meaning of Fijleh who is the main character in the game means radish in Arabic. Please see concept art below:

Our Team:

Mohammed Idrei: He dabbles in everything, has 6 years of experience as a 3D artist and he is a visual effects supervisor at B4Jordan. Mohammed is also an award winner for best visual effects for a foreign movie from Hollywood.

DurDur Draw Man: The shy concept/3D artist, has 4 years of experience in the 3D field, worked on couple of 3D feature films as a 3D artist. And Invaded Mars when it was cool, but he is that shy that doesn’t want for his name to be public yet!

Wajdi Adil Azar: The solid programmer, with 7 years of experience in programming and coding, living with “There is a script for that”.

Ibrahim Yasir: The Cube, 5 Years of experience in 3D Field, worked on couple of 3D feature films and iPad/iPhone games. 

Samples of our work:

Re-Planet iOS  - Ibrahim Yasir worked on it as a 3D Artist.

My Marbles iOS - Wajdi Adil Azar worked on it as a game developer. 

Mohammed Idrei's Work: 

Mohammed has also done Visual Effects, Camera Tracking and Compositing in these videos below:

B4 Demoreal

Ninja3

 

The Game’s Plot:

The plot follows Fijleh, a radish monk. He is a sword master and weapon specialist. His character is aggressive and easily angered; he hates people getting in his way. Fijleh is found sitting in his cave, searching for inner peace when his world is turned upside down by the ‘Idols’. The Idols are fallen Gods who were once worshipped but have lain dormant for a long period of time. Their arrival once more disrupted Fijleh’s meditation and his temperament leads him to seek revenge, armed with his Broccoli sword.

The game art is a cartoon-stylized form of animation, complementing the theme of the world. The game follows Fijleh on his quest where he meets multiple characters; allies, enemies and scary bosses. The game includes a Multiplier function, encouraging players to play together in Co-Op or against one another competitively.

 

Note : All the Materials in the video belong to "Team FoodFighter" but we've used fragments of a song called "Moyuru (Sprouting)" From the Album "Yoshida Brothers" By the "Yoshida Brothers" as the background music for this video, for it was the inspiration while making the video. 

We wanted to create an alpha downloadable level that would contain the basics of the gameplay, sadly we didn't have enough funds for it to be done, but here is a list of what the full game is planned to contain:

1. Single Player

Story Mode: Will give the player the option to choose his class, each class will have its own beginning and build-up.

Challenge Mode: Will give the player the pleasure to choose his class and complete certain challenges without the story line, slice'em and dice'em style.

There will be 5 elements used on the player's skill tree. These will be used in the multiplayer too. The better you build your character, the better your performance will be in multiplayer.

2. Multiplayer

Co-Op will have two Styles

1. The player can open a gate and summon a friend or a random player to aid in the mission and unlock achievements.

2. The player can create an instance to invite his friends to play the single player storyline or the multiplayer storyline. Depending on the classes that the players choose, the story of the game will be affected. 

Versus Mode

Two Players will be playing against each other; this is going to be the fun part. One player will choose the good side, ‘The Heroes’. The other will be on the bad side, "NPCs Non Player Characters".

The aim of this mode is to spark the competition; should an ‘NPC’ deny the main player from finishing the mission in the time challenge. "NPC" player possess the "limited" ability to shift control across other NPCs along with other chosen abilities (from the menu), giving him the edge to deny the main player soul harvest and health regeneration.

 

Technology :


This is one of the reasons we need the funds, to buy the licenses of the software we are going to be using to create and finish Sanam.We need to acquire a license for the game engine and other software.

We will also need to upgrade our development hardware to be fully capable of delivering this product on time. The game requires a hefty amount of horsepower to load all the elements and visuals, testing/debugging and general time consuming development activities. We are only four individuals, making this an even harder challenge, making our delivery estimate of "2 years" fairly reasonable, for developing and polishing this game. It is planned to be released for both Mac and PC hopefully through Steam.

 

We would like to express our gratitude to our friends and families for the awesome support! Special thanks to both DaremAqrabawi and WimMommen for editing and re-writing the story for Sanam.


If you'd like to see Sanam come to life, be part of our team, all you got to do is support us by donating for this project!

We are open for all your constructive criticism and comments, all in the name of making Sanam a solid and fun-to-play game!

So, if you found this campaign to your liking, help us reach our goal! Get yourself ready for an epic ride of fun!

Happy New Year!

Team FoodFighter
